vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2016-7910) (多项通告): kernel

description.html: The http.c:skip_short_body() function is called in some circumstances, such as when processing redirects. When the response is sent chunked in wget before 1.19.2, the chunk parser uses strtol() to read each chunk's length, but doesn't check that the chunk length is a non-negative number. The code then tries to skip the chunk in pieces of 512 bytes by using the MIN() macro, but ends up passing the negative chunk length to connect.c:fd_read(). As fd_read() takes an int argument, the high 32 bits of the chunk length are discarded, leaving fd_read() with a completely attacker controlled length argument.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 wget

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 wget 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2017-13089) CESA-2017:3075: wget

description.html: The retr.c:fd_read_body() function is called when processing OK responses. When the response is sent chunked in wget before 1.19.2, the chunk parser uses strtol() to read each chunk's length, but doesn't check that the chunk length is a non-negative number. The code then tries to read the chunk in pieces of 8192 bytes by using the MIN() macro, but ends up passing the negative chunk length to retr.c:fd_read(). As fd_read() takes an int argument, the high 32 bits of the chunk length are discarded, leaving fd_read() with a completely attacker controlled length argument. The attacker can corrupt malloc metadata after the allocated buffer.

description.html: A directory traversal issue was found in reposync, a part of yum-utils, where reposync fails to sanitize paths in remote repository configuration files. If an attacker controls a repository, they may be able to copy files outside of the destination directory on the targeted system via path traversal. If reposync is running with heightened privileges on a targeted system, this flaw could potentially result in system compromise via the overwriting of critical system files. Version 1.1.31 and older are believed to be affected.

description.html: OpenSSH 6.9以及早前版本的sshd的auth2-chall.c中的kbdint_next_device函数没有合理限制对单个连接中的键盘交互设备的处理，这更便于远程攻击者通过ssh-oKbdInteractiveDevices选项中长的和重复的列表执行暴力破解攻击或导致拒绝服务（CPU消耗），如修改的客户端所示，该客户端为此列表上的每个pam元素提供不同的密码。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 OpenSSH 到最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用更新：ftp://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/OpenSSH

OpenSSH的最新版本是7.6。

虽然你可以随时从源代码构建OpenSSH ，许多平台和发行版为OpenSSH提供了预构建的二进制包。这些预建软件包通常是针对特定分配进行定制和优化的，因此我们建议您使用可用于您的操作系统的软件包。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: OpenSSH漏洞: CVE-2015-5600

description.html: A security flaw was found in the chap_server_compute_md5() function in the ISCSI target code in the Linux kernel in a way an authentication request from an ISCSI initiator is processed. An unauthenticated remote attacker can cause a stack buffer overflow and smash up to 17 bytes of the stack. The attack requires the iSCSI target to be enabled on the victim host. Depending on how the target's code was built (i.e. depending on a compiler, compile flags and hardware architecture) an attack may lead to a system crash and thus to a denial-of-service or possibly to a non-authorized access to data exported by an iSCSI target. Due to the nature of the flaw, privilege escalation cannot be fully ruled out, although we believe it is highly unlikely. Kernel versions 4.18.x, 4.14.x and 3.10.x are believed to be vulnerable.

description.html:
下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商公告的说明。

From RHSA-2017:1106:

Mozilla Firefox is an open source web browser.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 52.1.0 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

From USN-3260-1:

Multiple security issues were discovered in Firefox. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit these to read uninitialized memory, obtain sensitive information, spoof the addressbar contents or other UI elements, escape the sandbox to read local files, conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks, cause a denial of service via application crash, or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2017-5429,CVE-2017-5430,CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433,CVE-2017-5434,CVE-2017-5435,CVE-2017-5436,CVE-2017-5437, CVE-2017-5438,CVE-2017-5439,CVE-2017-5440,CVE-2017-5441,CVE-2017-5442, CVE-2017-5443,CVE-2017-5444,CVE-2017-5445,CVE-2017-5446,CVE-2017-5447, CVE-2017-5448,CVE-2017-5449,CVE-2017-5451,CVE-2017-5453,CVE-2017-5454, CVE-2017-5455,CVE-2017-5456,CVE-2017-5458,CVE-2017-5459,CVE-2017-5460, CVE-2017-5461,CVE-2017-5464,CVE-2017-5465,CVE-2017-5466,CVE-2017-5467, CVE-2017-5468,CVE-2017-5469)

description.html: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent: Server : Partition). Supported versions that are affected are 5.5.58 and prior, 5.6.38 and prior and 5.7.19 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server as well as unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of MySQL Server accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.1 (Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:H).

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2018-2562) CESA-2018:2439: mariadb

description.html: Thunderbird 45.5报告了内存安全漏洞。其中一些错误显示内存损坏的证据，我们假设有足够的努力，其中一些可以被利用来运行任意代码。 此漏洞会影响Firefox < 50.1, Firefox ESR < 45.6, 和 Thunderbird < 45.6。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 thunderbird

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 thunderbird 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2016-9893) (多项通告): thunderbird

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: SSSD本地管理器回调未认证登陆漏洞

description.html: SSSD的某些版本没有正确处理新用户帐户的创建。这可能潜在地允许依赖语境的攻击者在SSH上登录帐户名称和任意密码。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
更新SSSD

用<code>yum

命令将SSSD更新至0.4.1。

From USN-3260-1:

Multiple security issues were discovered in Firefox. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit these to read uninitialized memory, obtain sensitive information, spoof the addressbar contents or other UI elements, escape the sandbox to read local files, conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks, cause a denial of service via application crash, or execute arbitrary code. vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Cent OS: CVE-2017-5449: CESA-2017:1104 (firefox)

description.html: 在关闭期间在某些情况下刷新刷新驱动程序计时器时，如果在仍在使用中删除计时器，则可能会发生UAF漏洞。 这导致潜在的可利用崩溃。 此漏洞会影响 Firefox < 62, Firefox ESR < 60.2, Thunderbird < 60.2.1。

description.html: procps-ng before version 3.3.15 is vulnerable to an incorrect integer size in proc/alloc.* leading to truncation/integer overflow issues. This flaw is related to CVE-2018-1124.

description.html: GStreamer 1.10.2之前版本的FLIC解码器中gst/flx/gstflxdec.c的flx_decode_delta_fli函数的基于堆的缓冲区溢出允许远程攻击者通过start_line参数执行任意代码或导致拒绝服务（应用程序崩溃）。

From USN-3260-1:

Multiple security issues were discovered in Firefox. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit these to read uninitialized memory, obtain sensitive information, spoof the addressbar contents or other UI elements, escape the sandbox to read local files, conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks, cause a denial of service via application crash, or execute arbitrary code. From RHSA-2017:1104:

Mozilla Firefox is an open source web browser.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 52.1.0 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

Multiple flaws were found in the processing of malformed web content. A web page containing malicious content could cause Firefox to crash or, potentially, execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Firefox. (CVE-2017-5429, CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433, CVE-2017-5434, CVE-2017-5435, CVE-2017-5436, CVE-2017-5437, CVE-2017-5438, CVE-2017-5439, CVE-2017-5440, CVE-2017-5441, CVE-2017-5442, CVE-2017-5443, CVE-2017-5444, CVE-2017-5445, CVE-2017-5446, CVE-2017-5447, CVE-2017-5448, CVE-2017-5449, CVE-2017-5459, CVE-2017-5460, CVE-2017-5464, CVE-2017-5465, CVE-2017-5469)

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Cent OS: CVE-2017-5433: CESA-2017:1104 (firefox)

description.html: libevent 2.1.6-beta之前版本的evdns.c的name_parse函数允许远程攻击者通过涉及label_len变量的向量产生不明影响，从而触发越界堆读取。

升级 thunderbird

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 thunderbird 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2016-10195) (多项通告): thunderbird

description.html: A mechanism to bypass file system access protections in the sandbox using the file system request constructor through an IPC message. This allows for read and write access to the local file system. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 52.1 and Firefox < 53.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

Multiple security issues were discovered in Firefox. From RHSA-2017:1104:

Mozilla Firefox is an open source web browser.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 52.1.0 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

Multiple flaws were found in the processing of malformed web content. A web page containing malicious content could cause Firefox to crash or, potentially, execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Firefox. (CVE-2017-5429, CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433, CVE-2017-5434, CVE-2017-5435, CVE-2017-5436, CVE-2017-5437, CVE-2017-5438, CVE-2017-5439, CVE-2017-5440, CVE-2017-5441, CVE-2017-5442, CVE-2017-5443, CVE-2017-5444, CVE-2017-5445, CVE-2017-5446, CVE-2017-5447, CVE-2017-5448, CVE-2017-5449, CVE-2017-5459, CVE-2017-5460, CVE-2017-5464, CVE-2017-5465, CVE-2017-5469)

description.html: OpenSSH 7.2之前版本的客户端对不可信X11转发的cookie生成失败，并依赖于本地X11服务器进行访问控制决策，这允许远程X11客户端通过利用X11服务器上的配置问题来触发回退问题并获取受信任的X11转发权限，如X11服务器上缺少的SECURITY扩展证明。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级至OpenSSH 7.2

从以下地址下载并应用升级：ftp://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/OpenSSH

     虽然可一直从源代码构建OpenSSH ，许多平台和发行版为OpenSSH提供了预先构建的二进制包。这些预构建的软件包通常是针对特定分发进行自定义和优化的，因此如果它们适用于您的操作系统，我们建议您使用这些软件包。

description.html:
目前NIST尚未对有关此漏洞的详情进行公布。以下提供了有关此漏洞的软件厂商公告的说明。

出自SUSE_CVE-2016-7979:

此CVE位于SUSE咨询SUSE-SU-2016:2492-1, SUSE-SU-2016:2493-1, openSUSE-SU-2016:2574-1, openSUSE-SU-2016:2648-1

出自USN-3148-1:

以Ghostscript处理某些Postscript文件的方式，Tavis Ormandy发现多个漏洞。如果用户或自动系统受骗打开特制的文件，那么攻击者可导致拒绝服务或可能执行任意代码。 (CVE-2016-7976,CVE-2016-7978, CVE-2016-7979,CVE-2016-8602)

在关于信息披露的Ghostscript中发现多个漏洞。如果用户或自动系统受骗打开特制的文件，那么攻击者可暴露敏感信息。 (CVE-2013-5653, CVE-2016-7977)

出自ELSA-2017-0013:

[9.07-20_1] - 增加了CVE-2013-5653（bug#1380327）的安全修复程序 - CVE-2016-7977（bug #1380415） - CVE-2016-7978（bug#1382300） - CVE-2016-7979（bug #1382305） - CVE-2016-8602（bug#1383940）

出自RHSA-2017：0014：CVE-2013-5653 (bug #1380327) - CVE-2016-7977 (bug #1380415) - CVE-2016-7979 (bug #1382305) - CVE-2016-8602 (bug #1383940)

出自HSA-2017:0013:

Ghostscript套件包含用于渲染PostScript和PDF文档的实用程序。 Ghostscript将PostScript代码翻译成通用位图格式，以便可以显示或打印代码。

安全修复程序：

发现ghostscript函数getenv、filenameforall和.libfile不符合-dSAFER选项，通常在处理不受信任的文档时使用，导致信息泄露。特制的postscript文件可以从目标中分别读取环境变量，列表目录和检索文件内容。（CVE-2013-5653，CVE-2016-7977）发现ghostscript函数.setdevice由于引用计数不正确而受到use-after-free漏洞的攻击。特制的ghostscript文件可以在gs进程的上下文中触发代码执行。（CVE-2016-7978）发现ghostscript函数.initialize_dsc_parser在使用它之前没有验证其参数，允许类型混淆缺陷。特制的postscript文档可能导致在gs进程的上下文中执行崩溃代码。（CVE-2016-7979）发现ghostscript没有充分检查给出.sethalftone5函数的参数的有效性。特制的postscript文档可能导致崩溃，或者在gs进程的上下文中执行任意代码。（CVE-2016-8602）

出自RHSA-2017:0014:

Ghostscript套件包含用于渲染PostScript和PDF文档的实用程序。 Ghostscript将PostScript代码翻译成通用位图格式，以便可以显示或打印代码。

安全修复程序：

发现ghostscript函数getenv、filenameforall和.libfile不符合-dSAFER选项，通常在处理不受信任的文档时使用，导致信息泄露。特制的postscript文件可以从目标中分别读取环境变量，列表目录和检索文件内容。（CVE-2013-5653，CVE-2016-7977）发现ghostscript函数.setdevice由于引用计数不正确而受到use-after-free漏洞的攻击。特制的ghostscript文件可以在gs进程的上下文中触发代码执行。（CVE-2016-7978）发现ghostscript函数.initialize_dsc_parser在使用它之前没有验证其参数，允许类型混淆缺陷。特制的postscript文档可能导致在gs进程的上下文中执行崩溃代码。（CVE-2016-7979）发现ghostscript没有充分检查给出.sethalftone5函数的参数的有效性。特制的postscript文档可能导致崩溃，或者在gs进程的上下文中执行任意代码。（CVE-2016-8602）

出自ALAS-2017-784:

发现ghostscript函数getenv、filenameforall和.libfile不符合-dSAFER选项，通常在处理不受信任的文档时使用，导致信息泄露。 特制的postscript文件可以从目标中分别读取环境变量、列表目录和检索文件内容。（CVE-2013-5653，CVE-2016-7977）

发现ghostscript函数.initialize_dsc_parser在使用它之前没有验证其参数，允许类型混淆缺陷。 特制的postscript文档可能导致在gs进程的上下文中执行崩溃代码。（CVE-2016-7979）

发现ghostscript没有充分检查给予.sethalftone5函数的参数的有效性。 特制的postscript文档可能导致崩溃，或者在gs进程的上下文中执行任意代码。（CVE-2016-8602）

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2016-7979) (多项通告): ghostscript

description.html: An integer overflow in "createImageBitmap()" was reported through the Pwn2Own contest. The fix for this vulnerability disables the experimental extensions to the "createImageBitmap" API. This function runs in the content sandbox, requiring a second vulnerability to compromise a user's computer. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 52.0.1 and Firefox < 52.0.1.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Cent OS: CVE-2017-5428: CESA-2017:0558 (firefox)

description.html: Artifex Ghostscript 9.25 and earlier allows attackers to bypass a sandbox protection mechanism via vectors involving the 1Policy operator.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2018-18284) CESA-2018:3834: ghostscript

description.html: A use-after-free vulnerability can occur during font face manipulation when a font face is freed while still in use, resulting in a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 52.6, Firefox ESR < 52.6, and Firefox < 58.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 thunderbird

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 thunderbird 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2018-5104) (多个公告): thunderbird

description.html: A use-after-free vulnerability can occur while enumerating attributes during SVG animations with clip paths. This results in a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 52.8, Thunderbird ESR < 52.8, Firefox < 60, and Firefox ESR < 52.8.

升级 thunderbird

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2018-5154) (多个公告): firefox

description.html:
下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商公告的说明。

From RHSA-2017:1106:

Mozilla Firefox is an open source web browser.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 52.1.0 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

Multiple flaws were found in the processing of malformed web content. A web page containing malicious content could cause Firefox to crash or, potentially, execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Firefox. (CVE-2017-5429, CVE-2017-5430, CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433, CVE-2017-5434, CVE-2017-5435, CVE-2017-5436, CVE-2017-5437, CVE-2017-5438, CVE-2017-5439, CVE-2017-5440, CVE-2017-5441, CVE-2017-5442, CVE-2017-5443, CVE-2017-5444, CVE-2017-5445, CVE-2017-5446, CVE-2017-5447, CVE-2017-5448, CVE-2017-5449, CVE-2017-5451, CVE-2017-5454, CVE-2017-5455, CVE-2017-5456, CVE-2017-5459, CVE-2017-5460, CVE-2017-5464, CVE-2017-5465, CVE-2017-5466, CVE-2017-5467, CVE-2017-5469)

Red Hat would like to thank the Mozilla project for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Mozilla developers and community, Nils, Holger Fuhrmannek, Atte Kettunen, Takeshi Terada, Huzaifa Sidhpurwala, Nicolas GrÃ©goire, Chamal De Silva, Chun Han Hsiao, Ivan Fratric of Google Project Zero, Anonymous working with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative, Haik Aftandilian, Paul Theriault, Julian Hector, Petr Cerny, Jordi Chancel, and Heather Miller of Google Skia team as the original reporters.

From DSA-3831:

Multiple security issues have been found in the Mozilla Firefox web

browser: Multiple memory safety errors, use-after-frees, buffer

overflows and other implementation errors may lead to the execution of

arbitrary code, information disclosure or denial of service.

From DLA-906-1:

firefox-esr - security update

From USN-3260-1:

Multiple security issues were discovered in Firefox. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit these to read uninitialized memory, obtain sensitive information, spoof the addressbar contents or other UI elements, escape the sandbox to read local files, conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks, cause a denial of service via application crash, or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2017-5429,CVE-2017-5430,CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433,CVE-2017-5434,CVE-2017-5435,CVE-2017-5436,CVE-2017-5437, CVE-2017-5438,CVE-2017-5439,CVE-2017-5440,CVE-2017-5441,CVE-2017-5442, CVE-2017-5443,CVE-2017-5444,CVE-2017-5445,CVE-2017-5446,CVE-2017-5447, CVE-2017-5448,CVE-2017-5449,CVE-2017-5451,CVE-2017-5453,CVE-2017-5454, CVE-2017-5455,CVE-2017-5456,CVE-2017-5458,CVE-2017-5459,CVE-2017-5460, CVE-2017-5461,CVE-2017-5464,CVE-2017-5465,CVE-2017-5466,CVE-2017-5467, CVE-2017-5468,CVE-2017-5469)

A flaw was discovered in the DRBG number generation in NSS. If an attacker were able to perform a man-in-the-middle attack, this flaw could potentially be exploited to view sensitive information. (CVE-2017-5462)

Multiple security issues were discovered in Firefox. From RHSA-2017:1104:

Mozilla Firefox is an open source web browser.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 52.1.0 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

Multiple flaws were found in the processing of malformed web content. A web page containing malicious content could cause Firefox to crash or, potentially, execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Firefox. (CVE-2017-5429, CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433, CVE-2017-5434, CVE-2017-5435, CVE-2017-5436, CVE-2017-5437, CVE-2017-5438, CVE-2017-5439, CVE-2017-5440, CVE-2017-5441, CVE-2017-5442, CVE-2017-5443, CVE-2017-5444, CVE-2017-5445, CVE-2017-5446, CVE-2017-5447, CVE-2017-5448, CVE-2017-5449, CVE-2017-5459, CVE-2017-5460, CVE-2017-5464, CVE-2017-5465, CVE-2017-5469)

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Cent OS: CVE-2017-5439: CESA-2017:1201 (thunderbird)

description.html: A use-after-free vulnerability can occur in design mode when image objects are resized if objects referenced during the resizing have been freed from memory. This results in a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 56, Firefox ESR < 52.4, and Thunderbird < 52.4.

升级 firefox

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2017-7819) (多项通告): thunderbird

description.html: A use-after-free vulnerability can occur when the widget listener is holding strong references to browser objects that have previously been freed, resulting in a potentially exploitable crash when these references are used. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 52.6, Firefox ESR < 52.6, and Firefox < 58.

From CESA-2018:2252:

Mozilla Thunderbird is a standalone mail and newsgroup client.

This update upgrades Thunderbird to version 52.9.1.

Security Fix(es):

Mozilla: Memory safety bugs fixed in Firefox 61, Firefox ESR 60.1, and Firefox ESR 52.9 (CVE-2018-5188)Mozilla: Buffer overflow using computed size of canvas element (CVE-2018-12359)Mozilla: Use-after-free using focus() (CVE-2018-12360)Mozilla: Integer overflow in SSSE3 scaler (CVE-2018-12362)Mozilla: Use-after-free when appending DOM nodes (CVE-2018-12363)Mozilla: CSRF attacks through 307 redirects and NPAPI plugins (CVE-2018-12364)thunderbird: S/MIME and PGP decryption oracles can be built with HTML emails (CVE-2018-12372)thunderbird: S/MIME plaintext can be leaked through HTML reply/forward (CVE-2018-12373)Mozilla: Compromised IPC child process can list local filenames (CVE-2018-12365)Mozilla: Invalid data handling during QCMS transformations (CVE-2018-12366)thunderbird: Using form to exfiltrate encrypted mail part by pressing enter in form field (CVE-2018-12374)

Multiple security issues were discovered in Firefox. From RHSA-2017:1104:

Mozilla Firefox is an open source web browser.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 52.1.0 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

Multiple flaws were found in the processing of malformed web content. A web page containing malicious content could cause Firefox to crash or, potentially, execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Firefox. (CVE-2017-5429, CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433, CVE-2017-5434, CVE-2017-5435, CVE-2017-5436, CVE-2017-5437, CVE-2017-5438, CVE-2017-5439, CVE-2017-5440, CVE-2017-5441, CVE-2017-5442, CVE-2017-5443, CVE-2017-5444, CVE-2017-5445, CVE-2017-5446, CVE-2017-5447, CVE-2017-5448, CVE-2017-5449, CVE-2017-5459, CVE-2017-5460, CVE-2017-5464, CVE-2017-5465, CVE-2017-5469)

From RHSA-2017:1104:

Mozilla Firefox is an open source web browser.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 52.1.0 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

Multiple flaws were found in the processing of malformed web content. From CESA-2019:0219:

Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser, designed for standards compliance, performance, and portability.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 60.5.0 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

Mozilla: Use-after-free parsing HTML5 stream (CVE-2018-18500)Mozilla: Memory safety bugs fixed in Firefox 65 and Firefox ESR 60.5 (CVE-2018-18501)Mozilla: Privilege escalation through IPC channel messages (CVE-2018-18505)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Red Hat would like to thank the Mozilla project for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Yaniv Frank (SophosLabs), Alex Gaynor, Christoph Diehl, Steven Crane, Jason Kratzer, Gary Kwong, Christian Holler, and Jed Davis as the original reporters.

From RHSA-2017:1106:

Mozilla Firefox is an open source web browser.

(CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433,CVE-2017-5434,CVE-2017-5435,CVE-2017-5437,CVE-2017-5438, CVE-2017-5439,CVE-2017-5440,CVE-2017-5441,CVE-2017-5442,CVE-2017-5449, CVE-2017-5451,CVE-2017-5454,CVE-2017-5459,CVE-2017-5460,CVE-2017-5464, CVE-2017-5465,CVE-2017-5466,CVE-2017-5469,CVE-2017-10195, CVE-2017-10196,CVE-2017-10197)

A flaw was discovered in the DRBG number generation in NSS. If an attacker were able to perform a man-in-the-middle attack, this flaw could potentially be exploited to view sensitive information. (CVE-2017-5462)

From DSA-3831:

Multiple security issues have been found in the Mozilla Firefox web

browser: Multiple memory safety errors, use-after-frees, buffer

overflows and other implementation errors may lead to the execution of

arbitrary code, information disclosure or denial of service.

From DLA-906-1:

firefox-esr - security update

From USN-3260-1:

Multiple security issues were discovered in Firefox. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit these to read uninitialized memory, obtain sensitive information, spoof the addressbar contents or other UI elements, escape the sandbox to read local files, conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks, cause a denial of service via application crash, or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2017-5429,CVE-2017-5430,CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433,CVE-2017-5434,CVE-2017-5435,CVE-2017-5436,CVE-2017-5437, CVE-2017-5438,CVE-2017-5439,CVE-2017-5440,CVE-2017-5441,CVE-2017-5442, CVE-2017-5443,CVE-2017-5444,CVE-2017-5445,CVE-2017-5446,CVE-2017-5447, CVE-2017-5448,CVE-2017-5449,CVE-2017-5451,CVE-2017-5453,CVE-2017-5454, CVE-2017-5455,CVE-2017-5456,CVE-2017-5458,CVE-2017-5459,CVE-2017-5460, CVE-2017-5461,CVE-2017-5464,CVE-2017-5465,CVE-2017-5466,CVE-2017-5467, CVE-2017-5468,CVE-2017-5469)

A flaw was discovered in the DRBG number generation in NSS. If an attacker were able to perform a man-in-the-middle attack, this flaw could potentially be exploited to view sensitive information. (CVE-2017-5462)

From RHSA-2017:1104:

Mozilla Firefox is an open source web browser.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 52.1.0 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

Multiple flaws were found in the processing of malformed web content. A web page containing malicious content could cause Firefox to crash or, potentially, execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Firefox. (CVE-2017-5429, CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433, CVE-2017-5434, CVE-2017-5435, CVE-2017-5436, CVE-2017-5437, CVE-2017-5438, CVE-2017-5439, CVE-2017-5440, CVE-2017-5441, CVE-2017-5442, CVE-2017-5443, CVE-2017-5444, CVE-2017-5445, CVE-2017-5446, CVE-2017-5447, CVE-2017-5448, CVE-2017-5449, CVE-2017-5459, CVE-2017-5460, CVE-2017-5464, CVE-2017-5465, CVE-2017-5469)

Red Hat would like to thank the Mozilla project for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Mozilla developers and community, Nils, Holger Fuhrmannek, Atte Kettunen, Huzaifa Sidhpurwala, Nicolas GrÃ©goire, Chamal De Silva, Chun Han Hsiao, Ivan Fratric of Google Project Zero, Anonymous working with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative, and Petr Cerny as the original reporters.

升级 firefox

From USN-3260-1:

Multiple security issues were discovered in Firefox. From RHSA-2017:1104:

Mozilla Firefox is an open source web browser.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 52.1.0 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

Multiple flaws were found in the processing of malformed web content. vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Cent OS: CVE-2017-5465: CESA-2017:1104 (firefox)

description.html: AT&T Virtual Network Computing (VNC)允许远程用户访问安装系统。如果此服务被破坏,用户可以完全控制系统。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
补丁程序VNC远程控制服务安装

移除或禁用此服务。如必要，设置合适（难破解）密码。需注意VNC将密码缩短至8个字节验证时，尽量使其不易破解。

为保护eaves-droppers的资料,tunnelingVNC至SSH推荐。

另外,还推荐限制访问特殊的IP地址。

使用TPC包装器

更多VNC信息，请访问VNC website.
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: VNC远程控制服务已安装

升级 firefox

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Cent OS: CVE-2017-5459: CESA-2017:1104 (firefox)

description.html: A crash triggerable by web content in which an "ErrorResult" references unassigned memory due to a logic error. The resulting crash may be exploitable. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 52, Firefox ESR < 45.8, Thunderbird < 52, and Thunderbird < 45.8.

description.html: A use-after-free and use-after-scope vulnerability when logging errors from headers for XML HTTP Requests (XHR). This could result in a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 54, Firefox ESR < 52.2, and Thunderbird < 52.2.

description.html: Memory safety bugs were reported in Firefox 53 and Firefox ESR 52.1. From RHSA-2017:1201:

Mozilla Thunderbird is a standalone mail and newsgroup client.

This update upgrades Thunderbird to version 52.1.0.

Security Fix(es):

Multiple flaws were found in the processing of malformed web content. A web page containing malicious content could cause Thunderbird to crash or, potentially, execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Thunderbird. (CVE-2017-5429, CVE-2017-5433, CVE-2017-5435, CVE-2017-5436, CVE-2017-5459, CVE-2017-5466, CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5434, CVE-2017-5438, CVE-2017-5439, CVE-2017-5440, CVE-2017-5441, CVE-2017-5442, CVE-2017-5443, CVE-2017-5444, CVE-2017-5446, CVE-2017-5447, CVE-2017-5454, CVE-2017-5460, CVE-2017-5464, CVE-2017-5465, CVE-2017-5469, CVE-2016-10195, CVE-2016-10196, CVE-2017-5445, CVE-2017-5449, CVE-2017-5451, CVE-2017-5467, CVE-2016-10197)

Red Hat would like to thank the Mozilla project for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Petr Cerny, Nils, Ivan Fratric (Google Project Zero), Takeshi Terada, Heather Miller (Google Skia team), Chun Han Hsiao, Chamal De Silva, Nicolas GrÃ©goire, Holger Fuhrmannek, Atte Kettunen, Haik Aftandilian, and Jordi Chancel as the original reporters.

From USN-3278-1:

Multiple security issues were discovered in Thunderbird. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted message, an attacker could potentially exploit these to read uninitialized memory, cause a denial of service via application crash, or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2017-5429, CVE-2017-5430,CVE-2017-5436,CVE-2017-5443,CVE-2017-5444,CVE-2017-5445, CVE-2017-5446,CVE-2017-5447,CVE-2017-5461,CVE-2017-5467)

Multiple security issues were discovered in Thunderbird. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website in a browsing context, an attacker could potentially exploit these to spoof the addressbar contents, conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks, cause a denial of service via application crash, or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433,CVE-2017-5434,CVE-2017-5435,CVE-2017-5437,CVE-2017-5438, CVE-2017-5439,CVE-2017-5440,CVE-2017-5441,CVE-2017-5442,CVE-2017-5449, CVE-2017-5451,CVE-2017-5454,CVE-2017-5459,CVE-2017-5460,CVE-2017-5464, CVE-2017-5465,CVE-2017-5466,CVE-2017-5469,CVE-2017-10195, CVE-2017-10196,CVE-2017-10197)

A flaw was discovered in the DRBG number generation in NSS. If an attacker were able to perform a man-in-the-middle attack, this flaw could potentially be exploited to view sensitive information. (CVE-2017-5462)

From CESA-2017:1104:

Mozilla Firefox is an open source web browser.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 52.1.0 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

Multiple flaws were found in the processing of malformed web content. A web page containing malicious content could cause Firefox to crash or, potentially, execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Firefox. (CVE-2017-5429, CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433, CVE-2017-5434, CVE-2017-5435, CVE-2017-5436, CVE-2017-5437, CVE-2017-5438, CVE-2017-5439, CVE-2017-5440, CVE-2017-5441, CVE-2017-5442, CVE-2017-5443, CVE-2017-5444, CVE-2017-5445, CVE-2017-5446, CVE-2017-5447, CVE-2017-5448, CVE-2017-5449, CVE-2017-5459, CVE-2017-5460, CVE-2017-5464, CVE-2017-5465, CVE-2017-5469)

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Cent OS: CVE-2017-5460: CESA-2017:1201 (thunderbird)

description.html: Heap-based buffer overflow in dnsmasq before 2.78 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or execute arbitrary code via a crafted DNS response.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 dnsmasq

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 dnsmasq 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

升级 dnsmasq-utils

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 dnsmasq-utils 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2017-14491) (多项通告): dnsmasq

description.html: A use-after-free vulnerability in the Media Decoder when working with media files when some events are fired after the media elements are freed from memory. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 45.7, Firefox ESR < 45.7, and Firefox < 51.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 thunderbird

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 thunderbird 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2017-5396) (多项通告): thunderbird

description.html: Memory safety bugs were reported in Firefox 52, Firefox ESR 52, and Thunderbird 52. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort that some of these could be exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 52.1, Firefox ESR < 52.1, and Firefox < 53.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2017-5430) CESA-2017:1106: firefox

(CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433,CVE-2017-5434,CVE-2017-5435,CVE-2017-5437,CVE-2017-5438, CVE-2017-5439,CVE-2017-5440,CVE-2017-5441,CVE-2017-5442,CVE-2017-5449, CVE-2017-5451,CVE-2017-5454,CVE-2017-5459,CVE-2017-5460,CVE-2017-5464, CVE-2017-5465,CVE-2017-5466,CVE-2017-5469,CVE-2017-10195, CVE-2017-10196,CVE-2017-10197)

A flaw was discovered in the DRBG number generation in NSS. If an attacker were able to perform a man-in-the-middle attack, this flaw could potentially be exploited to view sensitive information. (CVE-2017-5462)

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Cent OS: CVE-2017-5434: CESA-2017:1104 (firefox)

description.html: Memory safety bugs were reported in Firefox 59, Firefox ESR 52.7, and Thunderbird 52.7. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort that some of these could be exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 52.8, Thunderbird ESR < 52.8, Firefox < 60, and Firefox ESR < 52.8.

升级 thunderbird

升级 firefox

description.html: A use-after-free vulnerability can occur in the Fetch API when the worker or the associated window are freed when still in use, resulting in a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 56, Firefox ESR < 52.4, and Thunderbird < 52.4.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2017-7793) (多项通告): thunderbird

description.html: A buffer overflow occurs when drawing and validating elements with the ANGLE graphics library, used for WebGL content. This is due to an incorrect value being passed within the library during checks and results in a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 56, Firefox ESR < 52.4, and Thunderbird < 52.4.

description.html: OpenSSH 7.4之前版本的ssh-agent中ssh-agent.c的不可信搜索路径漏洞允许远程攻击者通过利用对转发的代理套接字的控制来执行任意本地PKCS＃11模块。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级to OpenSSH 7.4

从以下地址下载并应用更新：ftp://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/OpenSSH

当您一直使用构建来自源的OpenSSH时, 多个平台和版本为Apache HTTP服务器提供预先编译的二进制包。对于特殊版本通常自定义和优化预先编译的包。因此，如果它们适用于操作系统，我们推荐您使用这些包。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: OpenSSH漏洞: CVE-2016-10009

From CESA-2018:2112:

Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser, designed for standards compliance, performance, and portability.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 60.1.0 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

Mozilla: Memory safety bugs fixed in Firefox 61, Firefox ESR 60.1, and Firefox ESR 52.9 (CVE-2018-5188)Mozilla: Buffer overflow using computed size of canvas element (CVE-2018-12359)Mozilla: Use-after-free using focus() (CVE-2018-12360)Mozilla: Media recorder segmentation fault when track type is changed during capture (CVE-2018-5156)Skia: Heap buffer overflow rasterizing paths in SVG (CVE-2018-6126)Mozilla: Integer overflow in SSSE3 scaler (CVE-2018-12362)Mozilla: Use-after-free when appending DOM nodes (CVE-2018-12363)Mozilla: CSRF attacks through 307 redirects and NPAPI plugins (CVE-2018-12364)Mozilla: address bar username and password spoofing in reader mode (CVE-2017-7762)Mozilla: Compromised IPC child process can list local filenames (CVE-2018-12365)Mozilla: Invalid data handling during QCMS transformations (CVE-2018-12366)

description.html:
目前NIST尚未对有关此漏洞的详情进行公布。以下提供了有关此漏洞的软件厂商公告的说明。

出自SUSE_CVE-2016-7978:

此CVE位于SUSE咨询SUSE-SU-2016:2492-1, openSUSE-SU-2016:2574-1, openSUSE-SU-2016:2648-1

出自USN-3148-1:

以Ghostscript处理某些Postscript文件的方式，Tavis Ormandy发现多个漏洞。如果用户或自动系统受骗打开特制的文件，那么攻击者可导致拒绝服务或可能执行任意代码。 (CVE-2016-7976,CVE-2016-7978, CVE-2016-7979,CVE-2016-8602)

在关于信息披露的Ghostscript中发现多个漏洞。如果用户或自动系统受骗打开特制的文件，那么攻击者可暴露敏感信息。 (CVE-2013-5653, CVE-2016-7977)

出自ELSA-2017-0013:

[9.07-20_1] - 增加了CVE-2013-5653（bug#1380327）的安全修复程序 - CVE-2016-7977（bug #1380415） - CVE-2016-7978（bug#1382300） - CVE-2016-7979（bug #1382305） - CVE-2016-8602（bug#1383940）

出自RHSA-2017：0013：

Ghostscript套件包含用于渲染PostScript和PDF文档的实用程序。 Ghostscript将PostScript代码翻译成通用位图格式，以便可以显示或打印代码。

安全修复程序：

发现ghostscript函数getenv、filenameforall和.libfile不符合-dSAFER选项，通常在处理不受信任的文档时使用，导致信息泄露。特制的postscript文件可以从目标中分别读取环境变量，列表目录和检索文件内容。（CVE-2013-5653，CVE-2016-7977）发现ghostscript函数.setdevice由于引用计数不正确而受到use-after-free漏洞的攻击。特制的ghostscript文件可以在gs进程的上下文中触发代码执行。（CVE-2016-7978）发现ghostscript函数.initialize_dsc_parser在使用它之前没有验证其参数，允许类型混淆缺陷。特制的postscript文档可能导致在gs进程的上下文中执行崩溃代码。（CVE-2016-7979）发现ghostscript没有充分检查给出.sethalftone5函数的参数的有效性。特制的postscript文档可能导致崩溃，或者在gs进程的上下文中执行任意代码。（CVE-2016-8602）

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 ghostscript-gtk

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 ghostscript-gtk 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 ghostscript-doc 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

升级 ghostscript-cups

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 ghostscript-cups 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

升级 ghostscript

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 ghostscript 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

description.html:
下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商公告的说明。

From RHSA-2017:1106:

Mozilla Firefox is an open source web browser.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 52.1.0 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

Multiple flaws were found in the processing of malformed web content. A web page containing malicious content could cause Firefox to crash or, potentially, execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Firefox. (CVE-2017-5429, CVE-2017-5430, CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433, CVE-2017-5434, CVE-2017-5435, CVE-2017-5436, CVE-2017-5437, CVE-2017-5438, CVE-2017-5439, CVE-2017-5440, CVE-2017-5441, CVE-2017-5442, CVE-2017-5443, CVE-2017-5444, CVE-2017-5445, CVE-2017-5446, CVE-2017-5447, CVE-2017-5448, CVE-2017-5449, CVE-2017-5451, CVE-2017-5454, CVE-2017-5455, CVE-2017-5456, CVE-2017-5459, CVE-2017-5460, CVE-2017-5464, CVE-2017-5465, CVE-2017-5466, CVE-2017-5467, CVE-2017-5469)

Red Hat would like to thank the Mozilla project for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Mozilla developers and community, Nils, Holger Fuhrmannek, Atte Kettunen, Takeshi Terada, Huzaifa Sidhpurwala, Nicolas GrÃ©goire, Chamal De Silva, Chun Han Hsiao, Ivan Fratric of Google Project Zero, Anonymous working with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative, Haik Aftandilian, Paul Theriault, Julian Hector, Petr Cerny, Jordi Chancel, and Heather Miller of Google Skia team as the original reporters.

From DSA-3831:

Multiple security issues have been found in the Mozilla Firefox web

browser: Multiple memory safety errors, use-after-frees, buffer

overflows and other implementation errors may lead to the execution of

arbitrary code, information disclosure or denial of service.

From DLA-906-1:

firefox-esr - security update

From USN-3260-1:

Multiple security issues were discovered in Firefox. If a user were tricked in to opening a specially crafted website, an attacker could potentially exploit these to read uninitialized memory, obtain sensitive information, spoof the addressbar contents or other UI elements, escape the sandbox to read local files, conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks, cause a denial of service via application crash, or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2017-5429,CVE-2017-5430,CVE-2017-5432, CVE-2017-5433,CVE-2017-5434,CVE-2017-5435,CVE-2017-5436,CVE-2017-5437, CVE-2017-5438,CVE-2017-5439,CVE-2017-5440,CVE-2017-5441,CVE-2017-5442, CVE-2017-5443,CVE-2017-5444,CVE-2017-5445,CVE-2017-5446,CVE-2017-5447, CVE-2017-5448,CVE-2017-5449,CVE-2017-5451,CVE-2017-5453,CVE-2017-5454, CVE-2017-5455,CVE-2017-5456,CVE-2017-5458,CVE-2017-5459,CVE-2017-5460, CVE-2017-5461,CVE-2017-5464,CVE-2017-5465,CVE-2017-5466,CVE-2017-5467, CVE-2017-5468,CVE-2017-5469)

A flaw was discovered in the DRBG number generation in NSS. If an attacker were able to perform a man-in-the-middle attack, this flaw could potentially be exploited to view sensitive information. (CVE-2017-5462)

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

From RHSA-2017:1106:

Mozilla Firefox is an open source web browser.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Cent OS: CVE-2017-5442: CESA-2017:1104 (firefox)

description.html: An integer overflow can occur in the Skia library due to 32-bit integer use in an array without integer overflow checks, resulting in possible out-of-bounds writes. This could lead to a potentially exploitable crash triggerable by web content. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 52.8, Thunderbird ESR < 52.8, Firefox < 60, and Firefox ESR < 52.8.

description.html: OpenSSH 7.4之前版本的sshd中的共享内存管理器（与预认证压缩相关联）不能确保所有编译器都强制执行边界检查，这可能允许本地用户通过利用对沙盒特权分离进程的访问来获取权限，这与m_zback和m_zlib数据结构相关。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:

OpenSSH的最新版本是7.6。

虽然你可以随时从源代码构建OpenSSH ，许多平台和发行版为OpenSSH提供了预构建的二进制包。这些预建软件包通常是针对特定分配进行定制和优化的，因此我们建议您使用可用于您的操作系统的软件包。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: OpenSSH漏洞: CVE-2015-8325

description.html: A statement in the System Programming Guide of the Intel 64 and IA-32 Architectures Software Developer's Manual (SDM) was mishandled in the development of some or all operating-system kernels, resulting in unexpected behavior for #DB exceptions that are deferred by MOV SS or POP SS, as demonstrated by (for example) privilege escalation in Windows, macOS, some Xen configurations, or FreeBSD, or a Linux kernel crash. The MOV to SS and POP SS instructions inhibit interrupts (including NMIs), data breakpoints, and single step trap exceptions until the instruction boundary following the next instruction (SDM Vol. 3A; section 6.8.3). (The inhibited data breakpoints are those on memory accessed by the MOV to SS or POP to SS instruction itself.) Note that debug exceptions are not inhibited by the interrupt enable (EFLAGS.IF) system flag (SDM Vol. 3A; section 2.3). If the instruction following the MOV to SS or POP to SS instruction is an instruction like SYSCALL, SYSENTER, INT 3, etc. that transfers control to the operating system at CPL < 3, the debug exception is delivered after the transfer to CPL < 3 is complete. OS kernels may not expect this order of events and may therefore experience unexpected behavior when it occurs.

description.html: OpenSSH 6.8和6.9中的sshd使用TTY设备的全局可写权限，这允许本地用户通过写入设备导致拒绝服务（终端中断）或产生其他的不明影响，如通过写入转义字符所示。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 OpenSSH 到最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用更新：ftp://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/OpenSSH

OpenSSH的最新版本是7.6。

虽然你可以随时从源代码构建OpenSSH ，许多平台和发行版为OpenSSH提供了预构建的二进制包。这些预建软件包通常是针对特定分配进行定制和优化的，因此我们建议您使用可用于您的操作系统的软件包。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2017-11176) (多项通告): kernel

description.html: Linux kernel: heap out-of-bounds in AF_PACKET sockets. This new issue is analogous to previously disclosed CVE-2016-8655. In both cases, a socket option that changes socket state may race with safety checks in packet_set_ring. Previously with PACKET_VERSION. This time with PACKET_RESERVE. The solution is similar: lock the socket for the update. This issue may be exploitable, we did not investigate further. As this issue affects PF_PACKET sockets, it requires CAP_NET_RAW in the process namespace. But note that with user namespaces enabled, any process can create a namespace in which it has CAP_NET_RAW.

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年4月Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit JAXP漏洞 (CVE-2017-3526)

description.html: Oracle Java SE (子组件: JAXP)中的Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit组件中存在漏洞。受支持的版本为Java SE: 6u141、7u131和8u121; Java SE Embedded: 8u121; JRockit: R28.3.13。难以利用的漏洞允许具有网络权限的未经身份验证的攻击者通过多种协议危及Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致非法导致Java SE，Java SE Embedded，JRockit挂起或经常重复性崩溃（完整DOS）。注意：适用于客户端和服务器部署Java。可以通过沙盒Java Web Start应用程序和沙盒Java小程序来利用此漏洞。也可以通过向指定的组件中的API提供数据，而不使用沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙盒Java小程序（例如通过Web服务）来利用它。CVSS v3.0基本分数5.9（可用性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

description.html:
目前NIST尚未对有关此漏洞的详情进行公布。以下提供了有关此漏洞的软件厂商公告的说明。

出自SUSE_CVE-2016-7032:

此CVE位于SUSE咨询openSUSE-SU-2016:2878-1

出自ELSA-2016-2872:

[1.8.6p3-25]-更新noexec syscall黑名单-修复CVE-2016-7032和CVE-2016-7076解决方案：rhbz#1391937

出自RHSA-2016：2872：

sudo软件包包含sudo实用程序，允许系统管理员向特定用户提供执行权限命令的权限，这些命令用于系统管理目的，而无需以root用户身份登录。

安全修复程序：

发现，如果应用程序通过sudo执行system（），popen（）或wordexp（）C库函数，用户提供的参数运行，则可能会绕过sudo noexec限制。允许通过noexec限制的sudo运行此应用程序的本地用户可以使用这些缺陷以提升的权限执行任意命令。（CVE-2016-7032，CVE-2016-7076）

这些问题是由Florian Weimer（Red Hat）发现的

出自ALAS-2017-780：

发现如果应用程序通过sudo执行system（）或popen（）C库函数通过用户提供的参数运行，那么可以绕过sudo noexec限制。允许通过具有noexec限制的sudo运行此应用程序的本地用户可以使用此缺陷以提升的权限执行任意命令。（CVE-2016-7032）

发现如果应用程序通过sudo运行通过用户提供的参数执行wordexp（）C库函数，那么可以绕过sudo noexec限制。允许通过noexec限制的sudo运行此应用程序的本地用户可能会使用此缺陷以提升的权限执行任意命令。（CVE-2016-7076）

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2017-11600) CESA-2018:1965: kernel

description.html: Linux kernel: Exploitable memory corruption due to UFO to non-UFO path switch. When building a UFO packet with MSG_MORE __ip_append_data() calls ip_ufo_append_data() to append. However in between two send() calls, the append path can be switched from UFO to non-UFO one, which leads to a memory corruption. In case UFO packet lengths exceeds MTU, copy = maxfraglen - skb->len becomes negative on the non-UFO path and the branch to allocate new skb is taken. This triggers fragmentation and computation of fraggap = skb_prev->len - maxfraglen. Fraggap can exceed MTU, causing copy = datalen - transhdrlen - fraggap to become negative. Subsequently skb_copy_and_csum_bits() writes out-of-bounds. A similar issue is present in IPv6 code. The bug was introduced in e89e9cf539a2 ("[IPv4/IPv6]: UFO Scatter-gather approach") on Oct 18 2005.

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年10月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10346)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded组件（子组件：Hotspot）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u161, 7u151, 8u144 和 9; Java SE Embedded: 8u144。该漏洞容易利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded。成功的攻击需要攻击者以外的人员进行人员交互，虽然此漏洞存在于Java SE和Java SE Embedded中，但攻击可能会对其他产品产生重大影响。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致接管Java SE和Java SE Embedded。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱Java Applet的客户端中加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如来自Internet的代码）并依赖Java沙箱的安全性。此漏洞不适用于只加载和运行受信任代码（例如管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。CVSS 3.0基本评分9.6（机密性，完整性和可用性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

description.html: Oracle Java SE（子组件：Hotspot）中的Java SE和Java SE Embedded组件漏洞。受支持的版本是Java SE:7u121和8u112; Java SE Embedded: 8u111。易受攻击的漏洞允许未经身份验证的攻击者通过多种协议进行网络访问，从而危及Java SE，Java SE Embedded。成功的攻击需要来自攻击者以外的人的人工交互，而且该漏洞在Java SE，Java SE Embedded中，攻击可能会严重影响其他产品。此漏洞的成功攻击可能会导致Java SE，Java SE Embedded的接管。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙盒Java小应用程序的客户端中，这些客户端加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如，来自互联网的代码），并依赖Java沙盒来实现安全性。此漏洞不适用于加载并仅运行受信任代码（例如，由管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。 CVSS v3.0基本分数9.6（保密性，完整性和可用性影响）。

升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

description.html:
目前NIST尚未对有关此漏洞的详情进行公布。以下提供了有关此漏洞的软件厂商公告的说明。

出自SUSE_CVE-2016-8602:

此CVE位于SUSE咨询SUSE-SU-2016:2654-1, openSUSE-SU-2016:2648-1

出自USN-3148-1:

以Ghostscript处理某些Postscript文件的方式，Tavis Ormandy发现多个漏洞。如果用户或自动系统受骗打开特制的文件，那么攻击者可导致拒绝服务或可能执行任意代码。 (CVE-2016-7976,CVE-2016-7978, CVE-2016-7979,CVE-2016-8602)

在关于信息披露的Ghostscript中发现多个漏洞。如果用户或自动系统受骗打开特制的文件，那么攻击者可暴露敏感信息。 (CVE-2013-5653, CVE-2016-7977)

出自ELSA-2017-0013:

[9.07-20_1] - 增加了CVE-2013-5653（bug#1380327）的安全修复程序 - CVE-2016-7977（bug #1380415） - CVE-2016-7978（bug#1382300） - CVE-2016-7979（bug #1382305） - CVE-2016-8602（bug#1383940）

出自RHSA-2017：0014：CVE-2013-5653 (bug #1380327) - CVE-2016-7977 (bug #1380415) - CVE-2016-7979 (bug #1382305) - CVE-2016-8602 (bug #1383940)

出自HSA-2017:0013:

Ghostscript套件包含用于渲染PostScript和PDF文档的实用程序。 Ghostscript将PostScript代码翻译成通用位图格式，以便可以显示或打印代码。

安全修复程序：

发现ghostscript函数getenv、filenameforall和.libfile不符合-dSAFER选项，通常在处理不受信任的文档时使用，导致信息泄露。特制的postscript文件可以从目标中分别读取环境变量，列表目录和检索文件内容。（CVE-2013-5653，CVE-2016-7977）发现ghostscript函数.setdevice由于引用计数不正确而受到use-after-free漏洞的攻击。特制的ghostscript文件可以在gs进程的上下文中触发代码执行。（CVE-2016-7978）发现ghostscript函数.initialize_dsc_parser在使用它之前没有验证其参数，允许类型混淆缺陷。特制的postscript文档可能导致在gs进程的上下文中执行崩溃代码。（CVE-2016-7979）发现ghostscript没有充分检查给出.sethalftone5函数的参数的有效性。特制的postscript文档可能导致崩溃，或者在gs进程的上下文中执行任意代码。（CVE-2016-8602）

出自RHSA-2017:0014:

Ghostscript套件包含用于渲染PostScript和PDF文档的实用程序。 Ghostscript将PostScript代码翻译成通用位图格式，以便可以显示或打印代码。

安全修复程序：

发现ghostscript函数getenv、filenameforall和.libfile不符合-dSAFER选项，通常在处理不受信任的文档时使用，导致信息泄露。特制的postscript文件可以从目标中分别读取环境变量，列表目录和检索文件内容。（CVE-2013-5653，CVE-2016-7977）发现ghostscript函数.setdevice由于引用计数不正确而受到use-after-free漏洞的攻击。特制的ghostscript文件可以在gs进程的上下文中触发代码执行。（CVE-2016-7978）发现ghostscript函数.initialize_dsc_parser在使用它之前没有验证其参数，允许类型混淆缺陷。特制的postscript文档可能导致在gs进程的上下文中执行崩溃代码。（CVE-2016-7979）发现ghostscript没有充分检查给出.sethalftone5函数的参数的有效性。特制的postscript文档可能导致崩溃，或者在gs进程的上下文中执行任意代码。（CVE-2016-8602）

出自ALAS-2017-784:

发现ghostscript函数getenv、filenameforall和.libfile不符合-dSAFER选项，通常在处理不受信任的文档时使用，导致信息泄露。 特制的postscript文件可以从目标中分别读取环境变量、列表目录和检索文件内容。（CVE-2013-5653，CVE-2016-7977）

发现ghostscript函数.initialize_dsc_parser在使用它之前没有验证其参数，允许类型混淆缺陷。 特制的postscript文档可能导致在gs进程的上下文中执行崩溃代码。（CVE-2016-7979）

发现ghostscript没有充分检查给予.sethalftone5函数的参数的有效性。 特制的postscript文档可能导致崩溃，或者在gs进程的上下文中执行任意代码。（CVE-2016-8602）

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年7月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10101)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded组件（子组件：JAXP）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u151, 7u141 和 8u131; Java SE Embedded: 8u131。该漏洞容易利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded。成功的攻击需要攻击者以外的人员进行人员交互，虽然此漏洞存在于Java SE和Java SE Embedded中，但攻击可能会对其他产品产生重大影响。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致接管Java SE和Java SE Embedded。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱Java Applet的客户端中加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如来自Internet的代码）并依赖Java沙箱的安全性。此漏洞不适用于只加载和运行受信任代码（例如管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。CVSS 3.0基本评分9.6（机密性，完整性和可用性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU 2017年7月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10101)

description.html: File downloads encoded with "blob:" and "data:" URL elements bypassed normal file download checks though the Phishing and Malware Protection feature and its block lists of suspicious sites and files. This would allow malicious sites to lure users into downloading executables that would otherwise be detected as suspicious. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 56, Firefox ESR < 52.4, and Thunderbird < 52.4.

description.html:
下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商公告的说明。

From CESA-2018:2112:

Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser, designed for standards compliance, performance, and portability.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 60.1.0 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

Mozilla: Memory safety bugs fixed in Firefox 61, Firefox ESR 60.1, and Firefox ESR 52.9 (CVE-2018-5188)Mozilla: Buffer overflow using computed size of canvas element (CVE-2018-12359)Mozilla: Use-after-free using focus() (CVE-2018-12360)Mozilla: Media recorder segmentation fault when track type is changed during capture (CVE-2018-5156)Skia: Heap buffer overflow rasterizing paths in SVG (CVE-2018-6126)Mozilla: Integer overflow in SSSE3 scaler (CVE-2018-12362)Mozilla: Use-after-free when appending DOM nodes (CVE-2018-12363)Mozilla: CSRF attacks through 307 redirects and NPAPI plugins (CVE-2018-12364)Mozilla: address bar username and password spoofing in reader mode (CVE-2017-7762)Mozilla: Compromised IPC child process can list local filenames (CVE-2018-12365)Mozilla: Invalid data handling during QCMS transformations (CVE-2018-12366)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Red Hat would like to thank the Mozilla project for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Alex Gaynor, Christoph Diehl, Christian Holler, Jason Kratzer, David Major, Jon Coppeard, Nicolas B. Pierron, Marcia Knous, Ronald Crane, Nils, F. Alonso (revskills), David Black, and OSS-Fuzz as the original reporters.

description.html: In the Linux kernel through 4.19, a use-after-free can occur due to a race condition between fanout_add from setsockopt and bind on an AF_PACKET socket. This issue exists because of the 15fe076edea787807a7cdc168df832544b58eba6 incomplete fix for a race condition. The code mishandles a certain multithreaded case involving a packet_do_bind unregister action followed by a packet_notifier register action. Later, packet_release operates on only one of the two applicable linked lists. The attacker can achieve Program Counter control.

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年7月 Java SE 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10110)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE组件（子组件：AWT）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u151, 7u141 和 8u131。该漏洞容易利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE。成功的攻击要求攻击者以外的人员进行人工交互，虽然漏洞在Java SE中，但攻击可能会对其他产品产生重大影响。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致接管Java SE。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱Java Applet的客户端中加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如来自Internet的代码）并依赖Java沙箱的安全性。此漏洞不适用于只加载和运行受信任代码（例如管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。CVSS 3.0基本评分9.6（机密性，完整性和可用性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

description.html: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent: Server: Optimizer). Supported versions that are affected are 5.5.58 and prior, 5.6.38 and prior and 5.7.20 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.5 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

description.html:
默认情况下,许多linux系统启用的特性称为ICMP重定向,机器就会改变它的路由表在回应一个ICMP吗重定向消息从任何网络设备。

该特性有风险, 可以用来颠覆一个主机路由表以妥协安全(如通过他们侦查或改变一个特定的路线,，欺骗发送数据包)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
禁用ICMP重定向支持

作为root发布以下命令：

   sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects=0
   sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_redirects=0
   sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.secure_redirects=0
   sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.secure_redirects=0

这些配置可加至/etc/sysctl.conf并永久保存。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: 启用ICMP重定向

From CESA-2018:2252:

Mozilla Thunderbird is a standalone mail and newsgroup client.

This update upgrades Thunderbird to version 52.9.1.

Security Fix(es):

Mozilla: Memory safety bugs fixed in Firefox 61, Firefox ESR 60.1, and Firefox ESR 52.9 (CVE-2018-5188)Mozilla: Buffer overflow using computed size of canvas element (CVE-2018-12359)Mozilla: Use-after-free using focus() (CVE-2018-12360)Mozilla: Integer overflow in SSSE3 scaler (CVE-2018-12362)Mozilla: Use-after-free when appending DOM nodes (CVE-2018-12363)Mozilla: CSRF attacks through 307 redirects and NPAPI plugins (CVE-2018-12364)thunderbird: S/MIME and PGP decryption oracles can be built with HTML emails (CVE-2018-12372)thunderbird: S/MIME plaintext can be leaked through HTML reply/forward (CVE-2018-12373)Mozilla: Compromised IPC child process can list local filenames (CVE-2018-12365)Mozilla: Invalid data handling during QCMS transformations (CVE-2018-12366)thunderbird: Using form to exfiltrate encrypted mail part by pressing enter in form field (CVE-2018-12374)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Red Hat would like to thank the Mozilla project for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Alex Gaynor, Christoph Diehl, Christian Holler, Jason Kratzer, David Major, Jon Coppeard, Nicolas B. Pierron, Marcia Knous, Ronald Crane, Nils, F. Alonso (revskills), David Black, and OSS-Fuzz as the original reporters.

description.html: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent: Server: DDL). Supported versions that are affected are 5.5.58 and prior, 5.6.38 and prior and 5.7.20 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.5 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

description.html:
目前NIST尚未对有关此漏洞的详情进行公布。以下提供了有关此漏洞的软件厂商公告的说明。

出自DSA-3740:

在Samba中已经发现了一些漏洞，Samba是一个用于Unix的SMB/CIFS文件，打印和登录服务器。常见的漏洞和暴露项目确定了以下问题：

出自USN-3158-1：

Frederic Besler等发现Samba中的ndr_pull_dnsp_nam函数包含一个整数溢出。经过身份验证的攻击者可以使用此方法获取管理权限。这个问题只影响到Ubuntu 14.04 LTS，Ubuntu 16.04 LTS和Ubuntu 16.10。（CVE-2016-2123）

Simo Sorce发现，当使用Kerberos身份验证时，Samba客户端总是要求可转发的凭证。攻击者可以使用它来模拟经过身份验证的用户或服务。（CVE-2016-2125）Volker Lendecke发现Samba中的Kerberos PAC验证实现包含多个漏洞。经过身份验证的攻击者可能会使用这种方式来导致拒绝服务或获得管理权限。这个问题只影响到Ubuntu 14.04 LTS，Ubuntu 16.04 LTS和Ubuntu 16.10。（CVE-2016-2126）

出自VID-E4BC323F-CC73-11E6-B704-000C292E4FD8：

Samba小组报告：

[CVE-2016-2123]认证用户可以在DNS对象上提供恶意的dnsRecord属性，并触发受控内存损坏。

[CVE-2016-2125]Samba客户端代码在使用Kerberos身份验证时总是请求可转发的凭证。这意味着必须在当前或受信任的域/域中的目标服务器被赋予有效的通用Kerberos"Ticket Granting Ticket"（TGT），可用于完全模拟认证的用户或服务。

[CVE-2016-2126]由于PAC校验和的不正确处理，远程身份验证的攻击者可能会导致winbindd进程因使用合法Kerberos故障而崩溃。

访问winbindd特权管道的本地服务可能导致winbindd缓存提升的访问权限。

出自SUSE_CVE-2016-2125：

此CVE位于SUSE咨询

出自RHSA-2017：0662：

Samba是服务器消息块（SMB）协议和相关的公共Internet文件系统（CIFS）协议的开源实现，它允许PC兼容机器共享文件，打印机和各种信息。

安全修复程序：

发现Samba在使用Kerberos身份验证时始终请求可转发凭证。Samba使用Kerberos进行身份验证的服务可以随后使用该凭证将Samba模拟到其他服务或域用户。（CVE-2016-2125）以Samba处理PAC（特权属性证书）校验和的方式发现一个缺陷。远程的，经过身份验证的攻击者可以使用这个缺陷来使winbindd进程崩溃。（CVE-2016-2126）

其他更改：

有关此版本更改的详细信息，请参阅“参考”部分链接的“红帽企业Linux 6.9发行说明”和“红帽企业Linux 6.9技术说明”。

出自RHSA-2017：0744：

Samba是服务器消息块（SMB）或通用Internet文件系统（CIFS）协议的开源实现，它允许PC兼容机器共享文件，打印机和其他信息。

安全修复程序：

发现Samba在使用Kerberos身份验证时始终请求可转发凭证。Samba使用Kerberos进行身份验证的服务可以随后使用该凭证将Samba模拟到其他服务或域用户。（CVE-2016-2125）以Samba处理PAC（特权属性证书）校验和的方式发现了一个缺陷。远程的，经过身份验证的攻击者可以使用这个缺陷来使winbindd进程崩溃。（CVE-2016-2126）

其他更改：

有关此版本更改的详细信息，请参阅“参考”部分链接的“红帽企业Linux 6.9发行说明”和“红帽企业Linux 6.9技术说明”。

出自ELSA-2017-0662：

[3.6.23-41.0.1]-删除use-after-free的talloc_tos（）内联函数问题（John Haxby）[orabug 18253258][3.6.23-41]-解析：#1413672-秘密后的验证回归[3.6.23-40]-解析：#1405356-CVE-2016-2125 CVE-2016-2126[3.6.23-39]-解析：#1297805-修复打印机从AD中取消发布的问题[3.6.23-38]-解析：#1347843-修复RPC queryUserList为空列表返回NO_MEMORY[3.6.23-37]-解析：#1380151-修复idmap_ad模块中的内存泄漏-解析：#1333561-将垃圾邮件连接问题修复到DFS共享-解析：#1372611-允许无签名的ntlmsssp会话密钥设置（破坏的NetApp和EMC NAS的解决方法）

出自ELSA-2017-0744：

[4.2.10-9]-解析：#1405358-CVE-2016-2125 CVE-2016-2126[4.2.10-8]-使用RHEL 7.2.z同步Samba 4.2.10的修补程序-解析：#1383685-将samba4更新为与RHEL 7.2.z相符

出自DLA-776-1：

samba-安全更新

出自ELSA-2017-1265：

[4.4.4-13]-解析：#1437816-修复libads中的krb5内存缓存sasl代码-解析：#1437741-修复CVE-2016-2125，CVE-2016-2126和CVE-2017-2619

出自RHSA-2017：1265：

Samba是服务器消息块（SMB）协议和相关的公共Internet文件系统（CIFS）协议的开源实现，它允许PC兼容机器共享文件，打印机和各种信息。

安全修复程序：

发现Samba在使用Kerberos身份验证时始终请求可转发凭证。Samba使用Kerberos进行身份验证的服务可以随后使用该凭证将Samba模拟到其他服务或域用户。（CVE-2016-2125）以Samba处理PAC（特权属性证书）校验和的方式发现一个缺陷。远程的，经过身份验证的攻击者可以使用这个缺陷来使winbindd进程崩溃。（CVE-2016-2126）在samba服务器中发现竞态条件。恶意的samba客户端可以使用这个缺陷来访问文件和目录，而不是在共享定义下导出的服务器文件系统的区域。（CVE-2017-2619）

出自ALAS-2017-834：

在Samba中发现了远程代码执行缺陷。恶意认证的samba客户端，具有对samba共享的写入权限，可以使用此缺陷以root身份执行任意代码。（CVE-2017-7494）

发现Samba在使用Kerberos身份验证时始终请求可转发凭证。Samba使用Kerberos进行身份验证的服务可以随后使用该凭证将Samba模拟到其他服务或域用户。（CVE-2016-2125）

以Samba处理PAC（特权属性证书）校验和的方式发现了一个缺陷。远程的，经过身份验证的攻击者可以使用这个缺陷来使winbindd进程崩溃。（CVE-2016-2126）

在samba服务器中发现了竞态条件。恶意的samba客户端可以使用这个缺陷来访问文件和目录，而不是在共享定义下导出的服务器文件系统的区域。（CVE-2017-2619）

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年1月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit RMI 漏洞 (CVE-2017-3241)

description.html: Oracle Java SE (子组件: RMI)中的Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit组件中存在漏洞。受支持的版本为Java SE: 6u131, 7u121 and 8u112; Java SE Embedded: 8u111; JRockit: R28.3.12。难以利用的漏洞允许网络权限低的未经身份验证的攻击者通过多种协议危及Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit。当此漏洞位于Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit时，攻击者可能严重影响其他产品。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致接管Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit。注意：此漏洞只能通过向指定的组件中的API提供数据而不使用不受信任的Java Web Start应用程序或不受信任的Java小程序（例如通过Web服务）来利用此漏洞。CVSS v3.0基本分数9.0（保密性、完整性和可用性影响）。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2018年1月 Java SE 漏洞 (CVE-2018-2639)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE组件（子组件：Deployment）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 8u152 和 9.0.1。该漏洞较难利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE。成功的攻击要求攻击者以外的人员进行人工交互，虽然漏洞在Java SE中，但攻击可能会对其他产品产生重大影响。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致接管Java SE。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱Java Applet的客户端中加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如来自Internet的代码）并依赖Java沙箱的安全性。此漏洞不适用于只加载和运行受信任代码（例如管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。CVSS 3.0基本评分8.3（机密性，完整性和可用性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

description.html:
Details for this vulnerability have not been published by NIST at this point. Descriptions from software vendor advisories for this issue are provided below.

From CESA-2018:3834:

The Ghostscript suite contains utilities for rendering PostScript and PDF documents. Ghostscript translates PostScript code to common bitmap formats so that the code can be displayed or printed.

Security Fix(es):

ghostscript: Incorrect free logic in pagedevice replacement (699664) (CVE-2018-16541)ghostscript: Incorrect "restoration of privilege" checking when running out of stack during exception handling (CVE-2018-16802)ghostscript: User-writable error exception table (CVE-2018-17183)ghostscript: Saved execution stacks can leak operator arrays (incomplete fix for CVE-2018-17183) (CVE-2018-17961)ghostscript: Saved execution stacks can leak operator arrays (CVE-2018-18073)ghostscript: 1Policy operator allows a sandbox protection bypass (CVE-2018-18284)ghostscript: Type confusion in setpattern (700141) (CVE-2018-19134)ghostscript: Improperly implemented security check in zsetdevice function in psi/zdevice.c (CVE-2018-19409)ghostscript: Uninitialized memory access in the aesdecode operator (699665) (CVE-2018-15911)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Red Hat would like to thank Tavis Ormandy (Google Project Zero) for reporting CVE-2018-16541.

Bug Fix(es):

It has been found that ghostscript-9.07-31.el7_6.1 introduced regression during the handling of shading objects, causing a "Dropping incorrect smooth shading object" warning. With this update, the regression has been fixed and the described problem no longer occurs. (BZ#1657822)

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU October 2018 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit vulnerability (CVE-2018-3180)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: JSSE). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 6u201, 7u191, 8u182 and 11; Java SE Embedded: 8u181; JRockit: R28.3.19. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via SSL/TLS to compromise Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit accessible data as well as unauthorized read access to a subset of Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit accessible data and unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit. Note: This vulnerability applies to Java deployments, typically in clients running sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets (in Java SE 8), that load and run untrusted code (e.g. code that comes from the internet) and rely on the Java sandbox for security. This vulnerability can also be exploited by using APIs in the specified Component, e.g. through a web service which supplies data to the APIs. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.6 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:L).

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU July 2018 Java SE vulnerability (CVE-2018-2938)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: Java DB). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 6u191, 7u181 and 8u172. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java SE. While the vulnerability is in Java SE, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Java SE. Note: This vulnerability can only be exploited by supplying data to APIs in the specified Component without using Untrusted Java Web Start applications or Untrusted Java applets, such as through a web service. CVE-2018-2938 addresses CVE-2018-1313. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 9.0 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU October 2018 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit vulnerability (CVE-2018-3183)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: Scripting). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 8u182 and 11; Java SE Embedded: 8u181; JRockit: R28.3.19. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit. While the vulnerability is in Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit. Note: This vulnerability applies to Java deployments, typically in clients running sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets (in Java SE 8), that load and run untrusted code (e.g. code that comes from the internet) and rely on the Java sandbox for security. This vulnerability can also be exploited by using APIs in the specified Component, e.g. through a web service which supplies data to the APIs. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 9.0 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).

Mozilla Thunderbird is a standalone mail and newsgroup client.

This update upgrades Thunderbird to version 52.9.1.

Security Fix(es):

Mozilla: Memory safety bugs fixed in Firefox 61, Firefox ESR 60.1, and Firefox ESR 52.9 (CVE-2018-5188)Mozilla: Buffer overflow using computed size of canvas element (CVE-2018-12359)Mozilla: Use-after-free using focus() (CVE-2018-12360)Mozilla: Integer overflow in SSSE3 scaler (CVE-2018-12362)Mozilla: Use-after-free when appending DOM nodes (CVE-2018-12363)Mozilla: CSRF attacks through 307 redirects and NPAPI plugins (CVE-2018-12364)thunderbird: S/MIME and PGP decryption oracles can be built with HTML emails (CVE-2018-12372)thunderbird: S/MIME plaintext can be leaked through HTML reply/forward (CVE-2018-12373)Mozilla: Compromised IPC child process can list local filenames (CVE-2018-12365)Mozilla: Invalid data handling during QCMS transformations (CVE-2018-12366)thunderbird: Using form to exfiltrate encrypted mail part by pressing enter in form field (CVE-2018-12374)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

description.html: 匿名root登录应该只被允许从系统控制台。/etc/securetty允许您指定的tty #39;s和virual控制台允许root登录。在文件上列出tty和vc #39;s允许root登录某些tty #39;和vc #39;s。在其他tty或vc的root用户不被允许，用户必须使"su"成为根。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
编辑/etc/securetty项

删除/etc/securetty的所有条目，除了控制台，tty[0-9]* and vc\[0-9]*

注：SSH不使用 /etc/securetty。通过"PermitRootLogin" 设置/etc/ssh/sshd_config来禁用ssh的root登录，重启ssh守护进程。

description.html: An IMAP FETCH response line indicates the size of the returned data, in number of bytes. When that response says the data is zero bytes, libcurl would pass on that (non-existing) data with a pointer and the size (zero) to the deliver-data function. libcurl's deliver-data function treats zero as a magic number and invokes strlen() on the data to figure out the length. The strlen() is called on a heap based buffer that might not be zero terminated so libcurl might read beyond the end of it into whatever memory lies after (or just crash) and then deliver that to the application as if it was actually downloaded.

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年10月 Java SE 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10293)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE组件（子组件：Javadoc）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u161, 7u151, 8u144 和 9。该漏洞容易利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过HTTP来危害Java SE。成功的攻击要求攻击者以外的人员进行人工交互，虽然漏洞在Java SE中，但攻击可能会对其他产品产生重大影响。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致未经授权的更新、插入或删除对某些Java SE可访问数据的访问以及对Java SE可访问数据的一部分的未经授权的读取访问。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱Java Applet的客户端中加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如来自Internet的代码）并依赖Java沙箱的安全性。此漏洞不适用于只加载和运行受信任代码（例如管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。CVSS 3.0基本评分6.1（机密性和完整性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:C/C:L/I:L/A:N)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU 2017年10月 Java SE 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10293)

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2018年1月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit 漏洞 (CVE-2018-2637)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit组件（子组件：JMX）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u171, 7u161, 8u152 和 9.0.1; Java SE Embedded: 8u151; JRockit: R28.3.16。该漏洞较难利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit。成功攻击此漏洞可导致对关键数据或所有Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit可访问数据的未经授权的创建，删除或修改访问，以及未授权访问关键数据或完全访问所有Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit可访问的数据。注意：只有通过向指定组件中的API提供数据而不使用不可信Java Web Start应用程序或不可信Java Applet（例如通过Web服务）才能利用此漏洞。CVSS 3.0基本评分7.4（机密性和完整性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:N)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

description.html: A flaw was found in the way samba client before samba 4.4.16, samba 4.5.14 and samba 4.6.8 used encryption with the max protocol set as SMB3. The connection could lose the requirement for signing and encrypting to any DFS redirects, allowing an attacker to read or alter the contents of the connection via a man-in-the-middle attack.

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2018年1月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit 漏洞 (CVE-2018-2599)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit组件（子组件：JNDI）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u171, 7u161, 8u152 和 9.0.1; Java SE Embedded: 8u151; JRockit: R28.3.16。该漏洞较难利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit。对此漏洞的成功攻击可能会导致未经授权的更新，插入或删除某些Java SE，Java SE Embedded，JRockit可访问数据以及未授权能导致Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit部分拒绝服务（部分DOS）。注意：此漏洞适用于Java的客户端和服务器部署。此漏洞可以通过沙盒Java Web Start应用程序和沙盒Java小程序来利用。也可以通过向指定组件中的API提供数据而不使用沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱化Java小程序（例如通过Web服务）来利用它。CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.8 (Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:L)。

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU April 2018 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit vulnerability (CVE-2018-2783)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: Security). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 6u181, 7u161 and 8u152; Java SE Embedded: 8u152; JRockit: R28.3.17. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized creation, deletion or modification access to critical data or all Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit accessible data as well as unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit accessible data. Note: Applies to client and server deployment of Java. This vulnerability can be exploited through sandboxed Java Web Start applications and sandboxed Java applets. It can also be exploited by supplying data to APIs in the specified Component without using sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets, such as through a web service. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.4 (Confidentiality and Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:N).

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

description.html: 在OpenSSH 6.6及更早版本的客户端的sshconnect.c中的verify_host_key函数存在漏洞，远程攻击者通过提交不被接受的HostCertificate，触发跳过对SSHFP DNS RR的检查。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 OpenSSH 到最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用更新：ftp://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/OpenSSH

OpenSSH的最新版本是7.6。

虽然你可以随时从源代码构建OpenSSH ，许多平台和发行版为OpenSSH提供了预构建的二进制包。这些预建软件包通常是针对特定分配进行定制和优化的，因此我们建议您使用可用于您的操作系统的软件包。

description.html:
Details for this vulnerability have not been published by NIST at this point. Descriptions from software vendor advisories for this issue are provided below.

From CESA-2018:2884:

Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser, designed for standards compliance, performance, and portability.

This update upgrades Firefox to version 60.2.2 ESR.

Security Fix(es):

Mozilla: type confusion in JavaScript (CVE-2018-12386)Mozilla: stack out-of-bounds read in Array.prototype.push (CVE-2018-12387)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Red Hat would like to thank the Mozilla project for reporting these issues. The upstream acknowledges Niklas Baumstark, Samuel Groß, and Bruno Keith as the original reporters, via Beyond Security's SecuriTeam Secure Disclosure program.

description.html: OpenSSH 7.2p2之前版本sshd的session.c中的多个CRLF注入漏洞允许远程经过身份验证的用户通过与(1) do_authenticated1和(2) session_x11_req函数相关的特制X11转发数据绕过预设的shell命令限制。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级至OpenSSH 7.2p2

从以下地址下载并应用更新：ftp://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/OpenSSH

当从源搭建OpenSSH时，多个平台和版本提供提前搭建的适用于OpenSSH的二进制包。这些提前搭建的包通常为自定义和优化的，所以如果适用于您的操作系统，推荐使用这些包。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: OpenSSH漏洞: CVE-2016-3115

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年7月 Java SE 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10078)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE组件（子组件：Scripting）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 8u131。该漏洞容易利用，允许能访问网络的低特权攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE。对此漏洞的成功攻击可能会导致对关键数据或所有Java SE可访问数据的未经授权的创建，删除或修改访问，以及未授权访问关键数据或完全访问所有Java SE可访问数据。注意：此漏洞可以通过沙盒Java Web Start应用程序和沙盒Java小程序来利用。也可以通过向指定组件中的API提供数据而不使用沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱化Java小程序（例如通过Web服务）来利用它。CVSS 3.0基本评分8.1（机密性和完整性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:N)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU 2017年7月 Java SE 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10078)

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年1月 Java SE AWT 漏洞 (CVE-2017-3260)

description.html: Oracle Java SE中的Java SE组件（子组件：AWT）漏洞。受支持的版本是Java SE:7u121和8u112。难以利用的漏洞允许未经身份验证的攻击者通过多种协议进行网络访问，从而危及Java SE。成功的攻击需要来自攻击者以外的人的人工交互，而且该漏洞在Java SE中，攻击可能会严重影响其他产品。此漏洞的成功攻击可能会导致Java SE的接管。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙盒Java小应用程序的客户端中，这些客户端加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如，来自互联网的代码），并依赖Java沙盒来实现安全性。此漏洞不适用于加载并仅运行受信任代码（例如，由管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。 CVSS v3.0基本分数8.3（保密性，完整性和可用性影响）。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU July 2018 Java SE vulnerability (CVE-2018-2942)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: Windows DLL). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 7u181 and 8u172. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java SE. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker and while the vulnerability is in Java SE, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Java SE. Note: Applies to client and server deployment of Java. This vulnerability can be exploited through sandboxed Java Web Start applications and sandboxed Java applets. It can also be exploited by supplying data to APIs in the specified Component without using sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets, such as through a web service. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 8.3 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU July 2018 Java SE vulnerability (CVE-2018-2942)

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU October 2018 Java SE, Java SE Embedded vulnerability (CVE-2018-3169)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE, Java SE Embedded component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: Hotspot). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 7u191, 8u182 and 11; Java SE Embedded: 8u181. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java SE, Java SE Embedded. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker and while the vulnerability is in Java SE, Java SE Embedded, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Java SE, Java SE Embedded. Note: This vulnerability applies to Java deployments, typically in clients running sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets (in Java SE 8), that load and run untrusted code (e.g. code that comes from the internet) and rely on the Java sandbox for security. This vulnerability does not apply to Java deployments, typically in servers, that load and run only trusted code (e.g. code installed by an administrator). CVSS 3.0 Base Score 8.3 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

description.html: Remotely observable behaviour in auth-gss2.c in OpenSSH through 7.8 could be used by remote attackers to detect existence of users on a target system when GSS2 is in use. NOTE: the discoverer states 'We understand that the OpenSSH developers do not want to treat such a username enumeration (or "oracle") as a vulnerability.'

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 OpenSSH 到最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用更新：ftp://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/OpenSSH

OpenSSH的最新版本是7.6。

虽然你可以随时从源代码构建OpenSSH ，许多平台和发行版为OpenSSH提供了预构建的二进制包。这些预建软件包通常是针对特定分配进行定制和优化的，因此我们建议您使用可用于您的操作系统的软件包。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: OpenSSH 漏洞: CVE-2018-15919

description.html: 在7.6之前版本的OpenSSH中的sftp-server.c中的process_open函数不能正确地防止在只读模式时执行写操作，这允许攻击者创建零长度文件。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到 OpenSSH 版本 7.6

从以下站点下载并应用升级: ftp://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/OpenSSH

虽然您始终可以从源代码构建OpenSSH ，但许多平台和发行版都为OpenSSH提供了预构建的二进制包。这些预构建的软件包通常是针对特定分发进行定制和优化的，因此我们建议您使用这些软件包（如果它们适用于您的操作系统）。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: OpenSSH 漏洞: CVE-2017-15906

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU April 2018 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit vulnerability (CVE-2018-2798)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: AWT). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 6u181, 7u171, 8u162 and 10; Java SE Embedded: 8u161; JRockit: R28.3.17. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit. Note: Applies to client and server deployment of Java. This vulnerability can be exploited through sandboxed Java Web Start applications and sandboxed Java applets. It can also be exploited by supplying data to APIs in the specified Component without using sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets, such as through a web service. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.3 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L).

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本
