assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年10月 Java SE, JRockit 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10347)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、JRockit组件（子组件：Serialization）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u161, 7u151, 8u144 和 9; Java SE Embedded: 8u144。该漏容易利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、JRockit。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致未授权导致Java SE JRockit部分拒绝服务（部分DOS）的能力。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱Java Applet的客户端中加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如来自Internet的代码）并依赖Java沙箱的安全性。此漏洞不适用于只加载和运行受信任代码（例如管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。CVSS 3.0基本评分5.3（可用性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU 2017年10月 Java SE, JRockit 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10347)

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年1月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit库漏洞 (CVE-2016-5546)

description.html: Oracle Java SE (子组件: Libraries)中的Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit组件中存在漏洞。受支持的版本为Java SE: 6u131, 7u121 and 8u112; Java SE Embedded: 8u111; JRockit: R28.3.12。易于利用的漏洞允许网络权限低的未经身份验证的攻击者通过多种协议危及Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致未经授权创建、删除或修改关键数据或所有Java SE，Java SE Embedded，JRockit可访问数据的访问权。注意：适用于客户端和服务器部署Java。可以通过沙盒Java Web Start应用程序和沙盒Java小程序来利用此漏洞。也可以通过向指定的组件中的API提供数据，而不使用沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙盒Java小程序（例如通过Web服务）来利用它。CVSS v3.0基本分数7.5（完整性影响）。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU 2017年1月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit库漏洞 (CVE-2016-5546)

description.html: 攻击者可以使用JavaScript Map/Set定时攻击来确定特定上下文中的另一个隔离专区/区域是否使用了atom。 这可以用于跨网站泄漏信息，例如嵌入在JavaScript代码中的用户名。 此漏洞会影响Firefox < 50.1, Firefox ESR < 45.6, 和 Thunderbird < 45.6。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2016-9904) CESA-2016:2946: firefox

description.html: A mechanism to bypass file system access protections in the sandbox to use the file picker to access different files than those selected in the file picker through the use of relative paths. This allows for read only access to the local file system. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 52.1, Firefox ESR < 52.1, and Firefox < 53.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 thunderbird

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 thunderbird 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

description.html: ISC BIND 9.x至9.9.9-P5版本,9.10.x 至9.10.4-P5版本,和9.11.x至9.11.0-P2版本的命名允许远程攻击者通过对RTYPE ANY查询的格式错误的响应导致拒绝服务（断言失败和守护程序退出）。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2016-9131) CESA-2017:0062: bind

description.html: Hashed codes of JavaScript objects are shared between pages. This allows for pointer leaks because an object's address can be discovered through hash codes, and also allows for data leakage of an object's content using these hash codes. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 45.7, Firefox ESR < 45.7, and Firefox < 51.

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年7月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10115)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit组件（子组件：JCE）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u151, 7u141 和 8u131; Java SE Embedded: 8u131; JRockit: R28.3.14。该漏洞容易利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit。此漏洞的成功攻击可导致未经授权访问关键数据或完全访问所有Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit可访问数据。注意：此漏洞可以通过沙盒Java Web Start应用程序和沙盒Java小程序来利用。也可以通过向指定组件中的API提供数据而不使用沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱化Java小程序（例如通过Web服务）来利用它。CVSS 3.0基本评分7.5（机密性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

A data leak happens when these functions fill in sockaddr data structures used to export socket's diagnostic information. As a result, up to 100 bytes of the slab data could be leaked to a userspace.

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU October 2018 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit vulnerability (CVE-2018-3214)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: Sound). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 6u201, 7u191 and 8u182; Java SE Embedded: 8u181; JRockit: R28.3.19. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit. Note: This vulnerability applies to Java deployments, typically in clients running sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets (in Java SE 8), that load and run untrusted code (e.g., code that comes from the internet) and rely on the Java sandbox for security. This vulnerability can also be exploited by using APIs in the specified Component, e.g. through a web service which supplies data to the APIs. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.3 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L).

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年10月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10281)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit组件（子组件：Serialization）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u161, 7u151, 8u144 和 9; Java SE Embedded: 8u144; JRockit: R28.3.15。该漏洞容易利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致未授权导致Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit部分拒绝服务（部分DOS）的能力。注意：此漏洞可以通过沙盒Java Web Start应用程序和沙盒Java小程序来利用。也可以通过向指定组件中的API提供数据而不使用沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱化Java小程序（例如通过Web服务）来利用它。CVSS 3.0基本评分5.3（可用性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L)。

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: Security). description.html:
下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商公告的说明。

From CESA-2018:0102:

The Berkeley Internet Name Domain (BIND) is an implementation of the Domain Name System (DNS) protocols. BIND includes a DNS server (named); a resolver library (routines for applications to use when interfacing with DNS); and tools for verifying that the DNS server is operating correctly.

Security Fix(es):

A use-after-free flaw leading to denial of service was found in the way BIND internally handled cleanup operations on upstream recursion fetch contexts. A remote attacker could potentially use this flaw to make named, acting as a DNSSEC validating resolver, exit unexpectedly with an assertion failure via a specially crafted DNS request. (CVE-2017-3145)

Red Hat would like to thank ISC for reporting this issue. Upstream acknowledges Jayachandran Palanisamy (Cygate AB) as the original reporter.

description.html: Characters from the "Canadian Syllabics" unicode block can be mixed with characters from other unicode blocks in the addressbar instead of being rendered as their raw "punycode" form, allowing for domain name spoofing attacks through character confusion. The current Unicode standard allows characters from "Aspirational Use Scripts" such as Canadian Syllabics to be mixed with Latin characters in the "moderately restrictive" IDN profile. We have changed Firefox behavior to match the upcoming Unicode version 10.0 which removes this category and treats them as "Limited Use Scripts.". This vulnerability affects Firefox < 54, Firefox ESR < 52.2, and Thunderbird < 52.2.

description.html:
下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商公告的说明。

From CESA-2018:0158:

The Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) is a protocol that allows individual devices on an IP network to get their own network configuration information, including an IP address, a subnet mask, and a broadcast address. The dhcp packages provide a relay agent and ISC DHCP service required to enable and administer DHCP on a network.

Security Fix(es):

It was found that the DHCP daemon did not properly clean up closed OMAPI connections in certain cases. A remote attacker able to connect to the OMAPI port could use this flaw to exhaust file descriptors in the DHCP daemon, leading to a denial of service in the OMAPI functionality. (CVE-2017-3144)

description.html:
下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商公告的说明。

From CESA-2017:1105:

The Berkeley Internet Name Domain (BIND) is an implementation of the Domain Name System (DNS) protocols. BIND includes a DNS server (named); a resolver library (routines for applications to use when interfacing with DNS); and tools for verifying that the DNS server is operating correctly.

Security Fix(es):

A denial of service flaw was found in the way BIND handled a query response containing CNAME or DNAME resource records in an unusual order. A remote attacker could use this flaw to make named exit unexpectedly with an assertion failure via a specially crafted DNS response. (CVE-2017-3137)A denial of service flaw was found in the way BIND handled query requests when using DNS64 with "break-dnssec yes" option. A remote attacker could use this flaw to make named exit unexpectedly with an assertion failure via a specially crafted DNS request. (CVE-2017-3136)

Red Hat would like to thank ISC for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Oleg Gorokhov (Yandex) as the original reporter of CVE-2017-3136.

description.html: The DES and Triple DES ciphers, as used in the TLS, SSH, and IPSec protocols and other protocols and products, have a birthday bound of approximately four billion blocks, which makes it easier for remote attackers to obtain cleartext data via a birthday attack against a long-duration encrypted session, as demonstrated by an HTTPS session using Triple DES in CBC mode, aka a "Sweet32" attack.

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年10月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10350)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded组件（子组件：JAX-WS）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 7u151, 8u144 和 9; Java SE Embedded: 8u144。该漏洞容易利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致未授权导致Java SE、Java SE Embedded部分拒绝服务（部分DOS）的能力。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱Java Applet的客户端中加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如来自Internet的代码）并依赖Java沙箱的安全性。此漏洞不适用于只加载和运行受信任代码（例如管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。CVSS 3.0基本评分5.3（可用性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU 2017年10月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10350)

description.html: OpenSSH through 7.7 is prone to a user enumeration vulnerability due to not delaying bailout for an invalid authenticating user until after the packet containing the request has been fully parsed, related to auth2-gss.c, auth2-hostbased.c, and auth2-pubkey.c.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 OpenSSH 到最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用更新：ftp://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/OpenSSH

OpenSSH的最新版本是7.6。

虽然你可以随时从源代码构建OpenSSH ，许多平台和发行版为OpenSSH提供了预构建的二进制包。这些预建软件包通常是针对特定分配进行定制和优化的，因此我们建议您使用可用于您的操作系统的软件包。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2017-12163) (多项通告): samba4

description.html:
下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商公告的说明。

From CESA-2018:1852:

The kernel packages contain the Linux kernel, the core of any Linux operating system.

Security Fix(es):

Kernel: FPU state information leakage via lazy FPU restore (CVE-2018-3665)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Red Hat would like to thank Julian Stecklina (Amazon.de), Thomas Prescher (cyberus-technology.de), and Zdenek Sojka (sysgo.com) for reporting this issue.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2018-3646) (多个公告): kernel

description.html: kernel KVM before versions kernel 4.16, kernel 4.16-rc7, kernel 4.17-rc1, kernel 4.17-rc2 and kernel 4.17-rc3 is vulnerable to a flaw in the way the Linux kernel's KVM hypervisor handled exceptions delivered after a stack switch operation via Mov SS or Pop SS instructions. During the stack switch operation, the processor did not deliver interrupts and exceptions, rather they are delivered once the first instruction after the stack switch is executed. An unprivileged KVM guest user could use this flaw to crash the guest or, potentially, escalate their privileges in the guest.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2017-15649) CESA-2018:0151: kernel

description.html: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent: Client programs). Supported versions that are affected are 5.5.56 and earlier and 5.6.36 and earlier. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with logon to the infrastructure where MySQL Server executes to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of MySQL Server accessible data as well as unauthorized read access to a subset of MySQL Server accessible data and unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.3 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:L).

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2017-7980) (多项通告): qemu-kvm

description.html: 当启用某些代理和转发选项时，OpenSSH 5.x, 6.x和7.x至7.1p2的客户端所在的roaming_common.c中的(1) roaming_read 和(2) roaming_write函数不能正确保持连接文件描述符，这允许远程服务器通过请求多个转发导致拒绝服务（基于堆的缓冲区溢出）或可能产生不明的其他影响。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 OpenSSH 到最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用更新：ftp://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/OpenSSH

OpenSSH的最新版本是7.6。

虽然你可以随时从源代码构建OpenSSH ，许多平台和发行版为OpenSSH提供了预构建的二进制包。这些预建软件包通常是针对特定分配进行定制和优化的，因此我们建议您使用可用于您的操作系统的软件包。

description.html:
下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商公告的说明。

From CESA-2017:1793:

Graphite2 is a project within SIL's Non-Roman Script Initiative and Language Software Development groups to provide rendering capabilities for complex non-Roman writing systems. Graphite can be used to create "smart fonts" capable of displaying writing systems with various complex behaviors. With respect to the Text Encoding Model, Graphite handles the "Rendering" aspect of writing system implementation.

The following packages have been upgraded to a newer upstream version: graphite2 (1.3.10).

Security Fix(es):

Various vulnerabilities have been discovered in Graphite2. An attacker able to trick an unsuspecting user into opening specially crafted font files in an application using Graphite2 could exploit these flaws to disclose potentially sensitive memory, cause an application crash, or, possibly, execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2017-7771, CVE-2017-7772, CVE-2017-7773, CVE-2017-7774, CVE-2017-7775, CVE-2017-7776, CVE-2017-7777, CVE-2017-7778)

Red Hat would like to thank the Mozilla project for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Holger Fuhrmannek and Tyson Smith as the original reporters of these issues.

From CESA-2018:2571:

The Berkeley Internet Name Domain (BIND) is an implementation of the Domain Name System (DNS) protocols. BIND includes a DNS server (named); a resolver library (routines for applications to use when interfacing with DNS); and tools for verifying that the DNS server is operating correctly.

Security Fix(es):

bind: processing of certain records when "deny-answer-aliases" is in use may trigger an assert leading to a denial of service (CVE-2018-5740)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Red Hat would like to thank ISC for reporting this issue. Upstream acknowledges Tony Finch (University of Cambridge) as the original reporter.

From CESA-2017:3111:

Liblouis is an open source braille translator and back-translator named in honor of Louis Braille. It features support for computer and literary braille, supports contracted and uncontracted translation for many languages and has support for hyphenation. New languages can easily be added through tables that support a rule or dictionary based approach. Liblouis also supports math braille (Nemeth and Marburg).

Security Fix(es):

Multiple flaws were found in the processing of translation tables in liblouis. An attacker could crash or potentially execute arbitrary code using malicious translation tables. (CVE-2014-8184, CVE-2017-13738, CVE-2017-13740, CVE-2017-13741, CVE-2017-13742, CVE-2017-13743, CVE-2017-13744)

The CVE-2014-8184 issue was discovered by Raphael Sanchez Prudencio (Red Hat).

description.html: root的umask值是不安全的。umask值决定新创建的文件的文件许可权。它指定其不应被默认提供给新创建的文件的权限。虽然默认的umask值在大多数UNIX系统为022，但将其设置为077的常见做法是安全的。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
重置umask值

为了确保对新创建的文件的完整访问控制权限，设置的umask值为077给root用户以及交互式和非交互式进程的其他用户帐户。交互式进程的umask值通常设置一个shell配置文件，如.login，.cshrc，.profile和，.bashrc，.bash_profile中，或其它。对于非交互进程，在Linux系统用于控制的umask通常位于/etc/login.defs。在这两种情况下，你可能需要参照您的操作系统的文档查找正确的文件和设置。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: 不安全的Root umask值

description.html: 用于SSL的TransportSecurityInfo中可能被利用的崩溃可以由存储在用户配置文件目录中的本地缓存中的数据触发。 此问题仅可与另一个允许攻击者将数据写入本地缓存或本地安装的恶意软件的漏洞结合使用。 如果使用相同的配置文件，则此问题还会触发在Firefox的Nightly版本和Release版本之间切换的用户不可利用的启动崩溃。 此漏洞会影响 Thunderbird < 60.2.1, Firefox ESR < 60.2.1, Firefox < 62.0.2。

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE组件（子组件：Deployment）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 7u141 和 8u131。该漏洞较难利用，允许物理访问危及Java SE。虽然此漏洞在Java SE中，但攻击可能会对其他产品产生重大影响。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致接管Java SE。注意：适用于启用了Java自动更新的Java部署。CVSS 3.0基本评分7.1（机密性，完整性和可用性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:P/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H)。

description.html:
下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商公告的说明。

From CESA-2017:1793:

Graphite2 is a project within SIL's Non-Roman Script Initiative and Language Software Development groups to provide rendering capabilities for complex non-Roman writing systems. Graphite can be used to create "smart fonts" capable of displaying writing systems with various complex behaviors. With respect to the Text Encoding Model, Graphite handles the "Rendering" aspect of writing system implementation.

The following packages have been upgraded to a newer upstream version: graphite2 (1.3.10).

Security Fix(es):

Various vulnerabilities have been discovered in Graphite2. An attacker able to trick an unsuspecting user into opening specially crafted font files in an application using Graphite2 could exploit these flaws to disclose potentially sensitive memory, cause an application crash, or, possibly, execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2017-7771, CVE-2017-7772, CVE-2017-7773, CVE-2017-7774, CVE-2017-7775, CVE-2017-7776, CVE-2017-7777, CVE-2017-7778)

Red Hat would like to thank the Mozilla project for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Holger Fuhrmannek and Tyson Smith as the original reporters of these issues.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU January 2019 Java SE vulnerability (CVE-2018-11212)

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU January 2019 Java SE vulnerability (CVE-2019-2426)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: Networking). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 7u201, 8u192 and 11.0.1; Java SE Embedded: 8u191. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java SE. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Java SE accessible data. Note: This vulnerability applies to Java deployments, typically in clients running sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets (in Java SE 8), that load and run untrusted code (e.g., code that comes from the internet) and rely on the Java sandbox for security. This vulnerability can also be exploited by using APIs in the specified Component, e.g., through a web service which supplies data to the APIs. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 3.7 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2018年1月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit 漏洞 (CVE-2018-2618)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit组件（子组件：JCE）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u171, 7u161, 8u152 和 9.0.1; Java SE Embedded: 8u151; JRockit: R28.3.16。该漏洞较难利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit。此漏洞的成功攻击可导致未经授权访问关键数据或完全访问所有Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit可访问数据。注意：此漏洞适用于Java的客户端和服务器部署。此漏洞可以通过沙盒Java Web Start应用程序和沙盒Java小程序来利用。也可以通过向指定组件中的API提供数据而不使用沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱化Java小程序（例如通过Web服务）来利用它。CVSS 3.0基本评分5.9（机密性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N)。

description.html:
下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商公告的说明。

From CESA-2018:2252:

Mozilla Thunderbird is a standalone mail and newsgroup client.

This update upgrades Thunderbird to version 52.9.1.

Security Fix(es):

Mozilla: Memory safety bugs fixed in Firefox 61, Firefox ESR 60.1, and Firefox ESR 52.9 (CVE-2018-5188)Mozilla: Buffer overflow using computed size of canvas element (CVE-2018-12359)Mozilla: Use-after-free using focus() (CVE-2018-12360)Mozilla: Integer overflow in SSSE3 scaler (CVE-2018-12362)Mozilla: Use-after-free when appending DOM nodes (CVE-2018-12363)Mozilla: CSRF attacks through 307 redirects and NPAPI plugins (CVE-2018-12364)thunderbird: S/MIME and PGP decryption oracles can be built with HTML emails (CVE-2018-12372)thunderbird: S/MIME plaintext can be leaked through HTML reply/forward (CVE-2018-12373)Mozilla: Compromised IPC child process can list local filenames (CVE-2018-12365)Mozilla: Invalid data handling during QCMS transformations (CVE-2018-12366)thunderbird: Using form to exfiltrate encrypted mail part by pressing enter in form field (CVE-2018-12374)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Red Hat would like to thank the Mozilla project for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Alex Gaynor, Christoph Diehl, Christian Holler, Jason Kratzer, David Major, Jon Coppeard, Nicolas B. Pierron, Marcia Knous, Ronald Crane, Nils, F. Alonso (revskills), David Black, and OSS-Fuzz as the original reporters.

description.html:
此漏洞的详细信息尚未由NIST发布。 下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商建议的说明。

来源于 CESA-2017:0276:

伯克利互联网名称域（BIND）是域名系统（DNS）协议的实现。 BIND包含一个DNS服务器（named）; 一个解析器库（与DNS接口时使用的应用程序例程）; 以及验证DNS服务器是否正常运行的工具。

安全修复：

在使用DNS64和RPZ时，BIND处理查询响应的方式中发现拒绝服务漏洞。 远程攻击者可以利用这个漏洞通过特制的DNS响应来断言失败或空指针取消引用，从而使命名退出意外。(CVE-2017-3135)

红帽要感谢ISC报告这个问题。 上游承认Ramesh Damodaran（Infoblox）和Aliaksandr Shubnik（Infoblox）为原始报告者。

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年7月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10081)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded组件（子组件：Hotspot）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u151, 7u141 和 8u131; Java SE Embedded: 8u131。该漏洞容易利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded。成功的攻击需要攻击者以外的人进行人际交互。此漏洞的成功攻击可能会导致未经授权的更新、插入或删除对某些Java SE和Java SE Embedded可访问数据的访问。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱Java Applet的客户端中加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如来自Internet的代码）并依赖Java沙箱的安全性。此漏洞不适用于只加载和运行受信任代码（例如管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。CVSS 3.0基本评分4.3（完整性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU July 2018 Java SE, Java SE Embedded vulnerability (CVE-2018-2973)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE, Java SE Embedded component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: JSSE). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 6u191, 7u181, 8u172 and 10.0.1; Java SE Embedded: 8u171. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via SSL/TLS to compromise Java SE, Java SE Embedded. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized creation, deletion or modification access to critical data or all Java SE, Java SE Embedded accessible data. Note: This vulnerability applies to Java deployments, typically in clients running sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets, that load and run untrusted code (e.g., code that comes from the internet) and rely on the Java sandbox for security. This vulnerability does not apply to Java deployments, typically in servers, that load and run only trusted code (e.g., code installed by an administrator). CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.9 (Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:H/A:N).

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级至OpenSSH 6.9

从以下地址下载并应用更新: ftp://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/OpenSSH

即使您总可以从网址的资源中构建OpenSSH，许多平台和分布也为 OpenSSH 提供了预建的二进制包。这些预构建的软件包通常针对特定的分布进行定制和优化，因此我们建议如果它们可用于您的操作系统您可以使用该包。

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU July 2018 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit vulnerability (CVE-2018-2952)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: Concurrency). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 6u191, 7u181, 8u172 and 10.0.1; Java SE Embedded: 8u171; JRockit: R28.3.18. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service (partial DOS) of Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit. Note: Applies to client and server deployment of Java. This vulnerability can be exploited through sandboxed Java Web Start applications and sandboxed Java applets. It can also be exploited by supplying data to APIs in the specified Component without using sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets, such as through a web service. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 3.7 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L).

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2018年1月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit 漏洞 (CVE-2018-2678)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit组件（子组件：JNDI）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u171, 7u161, 8u152 和 9.0.1; Java SE Embedded: 8u151; JRockit: R28.3.16。该漏洞容易利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit。成功的攻击需要攻击者以外的人进行人际交互。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致未授权导致Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit部分拒绝服务（部分DOS）的能力。注意：此漏洞适用于Java的客户端和服务器部署。此漏洞可以通过沙盒Java Web Start应用程序和沙盒Java小程序来利用。也可以通过向指定组件中的API提供数据而不使用沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱化Java小程序（例如通过Web服务）来利用它。CVSS 3.0基本评分4.3（可用性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU 2018年1月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit 漏洞 (CVE-2018-2678)

description.html: Using SVG filters that don't use the fixed point math implementation on a target iframe, a malicious page can extract pixel values from a targeted user. This can be used to extract history information and read text values across domains. This violates same-origin policy and leads to information disclosure. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 52, Firefox ESR < 45.8, Thunderbird < 52, and Thunderbird < 45.8.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 thunderbird

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 thunderbird 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

升级 firefox

使用yum或up2date之类的工具将 firefox 更新到 CentOS 提供的最新版本。

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年7月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10135)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit组件（子组件：JCE）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u151, 7u141 和 8u131; Java SE Embedded: 8u131; JRockit: R28.3.14。该漏洞较难利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit。此漏洞的成功攻击可导致未经授权访问关键数据或完全访问所有Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit可访问数据。注意：此漏洞可以通过沙盒Java Web Start应用程序和沙盒Java小程序来利用。也可以通过向指定组件中的API提供数据而不使用沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱化Java小程序（例如通过Web服务）来利用它。CVSS 3.0基本评分5.9（机密性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N)。

description.html: Oracle Java SE中的Java SE, Java SE Embedded组件（子组件：Libraries）中存在漏洞。受支持的版本是Java SE:7u121和8u112;Java SE Embedded: 8u111。易于利用的漏洞允许未经身份验证的攻击者通过多种协议进行网络访问，从而危及Java SE, Java SE Embedded。成功的攻击需要来自攻击者以外的人的人工交互。成功的攻击可能会非法访问关键数据或完整的访问所有的Java SE, Java SE Embedded可访问的数据。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙盒Java小应用程序的客户端中，这些客户端加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如，来自互联网的代码），并依赖Java沙盒来实现安全性。此漏洞不适用于加载并仅运行受信任代码（例如，由管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。 CVSS v3.0基本分数6.5（保密性影响）。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

description.html:
下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商公告的说明。

From CESA-2018:2252:

Mozilla Thunderbird is a standalone mail and newsgroup client.

This update upgrades Thunderbird to version 52.9.1.

Security Fix(es):

Mozilla: Memory safety bugs fixed in Firefox 61, Firefox ESR 60.1, and Firefox ESR 52.9 (CVE-2018-5188)Mozilla: Buffer overflow using computed size of canvas element (CVE-2018-12359)Mozilla: Use-after-free using focus() (CVE-2018-12360)Mozilla: Integer overflow in SSSE3 scaler (CVE-2018-12362)Mozilla: Use-after-free when appending DOM nodes (CVE-2018-12363)Mozilla: CSRF attacks through 307 redirects and NPAPI plugins (CVE-2018-12364)thunderbird: S/MIME and PGP decryption oracles can be built with HTML emails (CVE-2018-12372)thunderbird: S/MIME plaintext can be leaked through HTML reply/forward (CVE-2018-12373)Mozilla: Compromised IPC child process can list local filenames (CVE-2018-12365)Mozilla: Invalid data handling during QCMS transformations (CVE-2018-12366)thunderbird: Using form to exfiltrate encrypted mail part by pressing enter in form field (CVE-2018-12374)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Red Hat would like to thank the Mozilla project for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Alex Gaynor, Christoph Diehl, Christian Holler, Jason Kratzer, David Major, Jon Coppeard, Nicolas B. Pierron, Marcia Knous, Ronald Crane, Nils, F. Alonso (revskills), David Black, and OSS-Fuzz as the original reporters.

description.html:
下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商公告的说明。

From CESA-2017:1680:

The Berkeley Internet Name Domain (BIND) is an implementation of the Domain Name System (DNS) protocols. BIND includes a DNS server (named); a resolver library (routines for applications to use when interfacing with DNS); and tools for verifying that the DNS server is operating correctly.

Security Fix(es):

A flaw was found in the way BIND handled TSIG authentication for dynamic updates. A remote attacker able to communicate with an authoritative BIND server could use this flaw to manipulate the contents of a zone, by forging a valid TSIG or SIG(0) signature for a dynamic update request. (CVE-2017-3143)A flaw was found in the way BIND handled TSIG authentication of AXFR requests. A remote attacker, able to communicate with an authoritative BIND server, could use this flaw to view the entire contents of a zone by sending a specially constructed request packet. (CVE-2017-3142)

Red Hat would like to thank Internet Systems Consortium for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Clement Berthaux (Synacktiv) as the original reporter of these issues.

Bug Fix(es):

ICANN is planning to perform a Root Zone DNSSEC Key Signing Key (KSK) rollover during October 2017. Maintaining an up-to-date KSK, by adding the new root zone KSK, is essential for ensuring that validating DNS resolvers continue to function following the rollover. (BZ#1459649)

description.html:
目前NIST尚未对有关此漏洞的详情进行公布。以下提供了有关此漏洞的软件厂商公告的说明。

出自SUSE_CVE-2016-7977:

此CVE位于SUSE咨询SUSE-SU-2016:2493-1

出自USN-3148-1:

以Ghostscript处理某些Postscript文件的方式，Tavis Ormandy发现多个漏洞。如果用户或自动系统受骗打开特制的文件，那么攻击者可导致拒绝服务或可能执行任意代码。 (CVE-2016-7976,CVE-2016-7978, CVE-2016-7979,CVE-2016-8602)

在关于信息披露的Ghostscript中发现多个漏洞。如果用户或自动系统受骗打开特制的文件，那么攻击者可暴露敏感信息。 (CVE-2013-5653, CVE-2016-7977)

出自ELSA-2017-0013:

[9.07-20_1] - 增加了CVE-2013-5653（bug#1380327）的安全修复程序 - CVE-2016-7977（bug #1380415） - CVE-2016-7978（bug#1382300） - CVE-2016-7979（bug #1382305） - CVE-2016-8602（bug#1383940）

出自RHSA-2017：0014：CVE-2013-5653 (bug #1380327) - CVE-2016-7977 (bug #1380415) - CVE-2016-7979 (bug #1382305) - CVE-2016-8602 (bug #1383940)

出自HSA-2017:0013:

Ghostscript套件包含用于渲染PostScript和PDF文档的实用程序。 Ghostscript将PostScript代码翻译成通用位图格式，以便可以显示或打印代码。

安全修复程序：

发现ghostscript函数getenv、filenameforall和.libfile不符合-dSAFER选项，通常在处理不受信任的文档时使用，导致信息泄露。特制的postscript文件可以从目标中分别读取环境变量，列表目录和检索文件内容。（CVE-2013-5653，CVE-2016-7977）发现ghostscript函数.setdevice由于引用计数不正确而受到use-after-free漏洞的攻击。特制的ghostscript文件可以在gs进程的上下文中触发代码执行。（CVE-2016-7978）发现ghostscript函数.initialize_dsc_parser在使用它之前没有验证其参数，允许类型混淆缺陷。特制的postscript文档可能导致在gs进程的上下文中执行崩溃代码。（CVE-2016-7979）发现ghostscript没有充分检查给出.sethalftone5函数的参数的有效性。特制的postscript文档可能导致崩溃，或者在gs进程的上下文中执行任意代码。（CVE-2016-8602）

出自RHSA-2017:0014:

Ghostscript套件包含用于渲染PostScript和PDF文档的实用程序。 Ghostscript将PostScript代码翻译成通用位图格式，以便可以显示或打印代码。

安全修复程序：

发现ghostscript函数getenv、filenameforall和.libfile不符合-dSAFER选项，通常在处理不受信任的文档时使用，导致信息泄露。特制的postscript文件可以从目标中分别读取环境变量，列表目录和检索文件内容。（CVE-2013-5653，CVE-2016-7977）发现ghostscript函数.setdevice由于引用计数不正确而受到use-after-free漏洞的攻击。特制的ghostscript文件可以在gs进程的上下文中触发代码执行。（CVE-2016-7978）发现ghostscript函数.initialize_dsc_parser在使用它之前没有验证其参数，允许类型混淆缺陷。特制的postscript文档可能导致在gs进程的上下文中执行崩溃代码。（CVE-2016-7979）发现ghostscript没有充分检查给出.sethalftone5函数的参数的有效性。特制的postscript文档可能导致崩溃，或者在gs进程的上下文中执行任意代码。（CVE-2016-8602）

出自ALAS-2017-784:

发现ghostscript函数getenv、filenameforall和.libfile不符合-dSAFER选项，通常在处理不受信任的文档时使用，导致信息泄露。 特制的postscript文件可以从目标中分别读取环境变量、列表目录和检索文件内容。（CVE-2013-5653，CVE-2016-7977）

发现ghostscript函数.initialize_dsc_parser在使用它之前没有验证其参数，允许类型混淆缺陷。 特制的postscript文档可能导致在gs进程的上下文中执行崩溃代码。（CVE-2016-7979）

发现ghostscript没有充分检查给予.sethalftone5函数的参数的有效性。 特制的postscript文档可能导致崩溃，或者在gs进程的上下文中执行任意代码。（CVE-2016-8602）

From CESA-2017:1680:

The Berkeley Internet Name Domain (BIND) is an implementation of the Domain Name System (DNS) protocols. BIND includes a DNS server (named); a resolver library (routines for applications to use when interfacing with DNS); and tools for verifying that the DNS server is operating correctly.

Security Fix(es):

A flaw was found in the way BIND handled TSIG authentication for dynamic updates. A remote attacker able to communicate with an authoritative BIND server could use this flaw to manipulate the contents of a zone, by forging a valid TSIG or SIG(0) signature for a dynamic update request. (CVE-2017-3143)A flaw was found in the way BIND handled TSIG authentication of AXFR requests. A remote attacker, able to communicate with an authoritative BIND server, could use this flaw to view the entire contents of a zone by sending a specially constructed request packet. (CVE-2017-3142)

Red Hat would like to thank Internet Systems Consortium for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Clement Berthaux (Synacktiv) as the original reporter of these issues.

Bug Fix(es):

ICANN is planning to perform a Root Zone DNSSEC Key Signing Key (KSK) rollover during October 2017. Maintaining an up-to-date KSK, by adding the new root zone KSK, is essential for ensuring that validating DNS resolvers continue to function following the rollover. (BZ#1459649)

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2018年1月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit 漏洞 (CVE-2018-2579)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit组件（子组件：Libraries）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u171, 7u161, 8u152 和 9.0.1; Java SE Embedded: 8u151; JRockit: R28.3.16。该漏洞较难利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit。此漏洞的成功攻击可能会导致对Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit可访问数据的一部分进行未经授权的读取访问。注意：此漏洞适用于Java的客户端和服务器部署。此漏洞可以通过沙盒Java Web Start应用程序和沙盒Java小程序来利用。也可以通过向指定组件中的API提供数据而不使用沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱化Java小程序（例如通过Web服务）来利用它。CVSS 3.0基本评分3.7（机密性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

description.html: By exploiting the way Apache OpenOffice before 4.1.4 renders embedded objects, an attacker could craft a document that allows reading in a file from the user's filesystem. Information could be retrieved by the attacker by, e.g., using hidden sections to store the information, tricking the user into saving the document and convincing the user to send the document back to the attacker. The vulnerability is mitigated by the need for the attacker to know the precise file path in the target system, and the need to trick the user into saving the document and sending it back.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2017-3157) (多项通告): libreoffice

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU January 2019 Java SE vulnerability (CVE-2019-2422)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: Libraries). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 7u201, 8u192 and 11.0.1; Java SE Embedded: 8u191. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java SE. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Java SE accessible data. Note: This vulnerability applies to Java deployments, typically in clients running sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets (in Java SE 8), that load and run untrusted code (e.g., code that comes from the internet) and rely on the Java sandbox for security. This vulnerability does not apply to Java deployments, typically in servers, that load and run only trusted code (e.g., code installed by an administrator). CVSS 3.0 Base Score 3.1 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU January 2019 Java SE vulnerability (CVE-2019-2422)

description.html: NTP 4.2.8p9之前版本将对等体结构更改为从源接收响应的接口，这允许远程攻击者通过将源的响应发送到源不使用的接口来导致拒绝服务（阻止与源通信）。

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年1月 Java SE发展漏洞 (CVE-2017-3259)

description.html: Oracle Java SE中的Java SE组件（子组件：Deployment）漏洞。受支持的版本是Java SE: 6u131, 7u121和8u112。难以利用的漏洞允许未经身份验证的攻击者通过多种协议进行网络访问，从而危及Java SE。成功的攻击可能会非法读取Java SE访问数据的子集。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙盒Java小应用程序的客户端中，这些客户端加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如，来自互联网的代码），并依赖Java沙盒来实现安全性。此漏洞不适用于加载并仅运行受信任代码（例如，由管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。 CVSS v3.0基本分数3.7（保密性影响）。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU 2017年1月 Java SE发展漏洞 (CVE-2017-3259)

description.html: GStreamer 1.10.2之前版本的mpegts解析器中的_parse_pat函数允许远程攻击者通过特制的文件导致拒绝服务（空指针引用和崩溃）。

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年7月 Java SE 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10105)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE组件（子组件：Deployment）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u151, 7u141 和 8u131。该漏洞容易利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE。成功的攻击需要攻击者以外的人进行人际交互。此漏洞的成功攻击可能会导致未经授权的更新、插入或删除对某些Java SE可访问数据的访问。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱Java Applet的客户端中加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如来自Internet的代码）并依赖Java沙箱的安全性。此漏洞不适用于只加载和运行受信任代码（例如管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。CVSS 3.0基本评分4.3（完整性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU 2017年7月 Java SE 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10105)

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年1月 Java SE, Java SE嵌入式网络漏洞 (CVE-2017-3231)

description.html: Oracle Java SE中的Java SE, Java SE Embedded组件（子组件：Networking）中存在漏洞。受支持的版本是Java SE: 6u131, 7u121和8u112;Java SE Embedded: 8u111。易于利用的漏洞允许未经身份验证的攻击者通过多种协议进行网络访问，从而危及Java SE, Java SE Embedded。成功的攻击需要来自攻击者以外的人的人工交互。成功的攻击可能会非法读取Java SE, Java SE Embedded访问数据的子集。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙盒Java小应用程序的客户端中，这些客户端加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如，来自互联网的代码），并依赖Java沙盒来实现安全性。此漏洞不适用于加载并仅运行受信任代码（例如，由管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。 CVSS v3.0基本分数4.3（保密性影响）。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU 2017年1月 Java SE, Java SE嵌入式网络漏洞 (CVE-2017-3231)

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2018年1月 Java SE 漏洞 (CVE-2018-2581)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE组件（子组件：JavaFX）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 7u161, 8u152 和 9.0.1。该漏洞容易利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE。成功的攻击要求攻击者以外的人员进行人工交互，虽然漏洞在Java SE中，但攻击可能会对其他产品产生重大影响。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致对Java SE可访问数据的子集进行未经授权的读取访问。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱Java Applet的客户端中加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如来自Internet的代码）并依赖Java沙箱的安全性。此漏洞不适用于只加载和运行受信任代码（例如管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。CVSS 3.0基本评分4.7（机密性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:C/C:L/I:N/A:N)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2018-1049) CESA-2018:0260: systemd

description.html:
下面提供了有关此问题的软件供应商公告的说明。

From CESA-2017:1105:

The Berkeley Internet Name Domain (BIND) is an implementation of the Domain Name System (DNS) protocols. BIND includes a DNS server (named); a resolver library (routines for applications to use when interfacing with DNS); and tools for verifying that the DNS server is operating correctly.

Security Fix(es):

A denial of service flaw was found in the way BIND handled a query response containing CNAME or DNAME resource records in an unusual order. A remote attacker could use this flaw to make named exit unexpectedly with an assertion failure via a specially crafted DNS response. (CVE-2017-3137)A denial of service flaw was found in the way BIND handled query requests when using DNS64 with "break-dnssec yes" option. A remote attacker could use this flaw to make named exit unexpectedly with an assertion failure via a specially crafted DNS request. (CVE-2017-3136)

Red Hat would like to thank ISC for reporting these issues. Upstream acknowledges Oleg Gorokhov (Yandex) as the original reporter of CVE-2017-3136.

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU July 2018 Java SE, Java SE Embedded vulnerability (CVE-2018-2940)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE, Java SE Embedded component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: Libraries). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 6u191, 7u181, 8u172 and 10.0.1; Java SE Embedded: 8u171. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java SE, Java SE Embedded. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Java SE, Java SE Embedded accessible data. Note: This vulnerability applies to Java deployments, typically in clients running sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets, that load and run untrusted code (e.g., code that comes from the internet) and rely on the Java sandbox for security. This vulnerability does not apply to Java deployments, typically in servers, that load and run only trusted code (e.g., code installed by an administrator). CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

description.html: It was found that sssd's sysdb_search_user_by_upn_res() function before 1.16.0 did not sanitize requests when querying its local cache and was vulnerable to injection. assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU April 2018 Java SE, JRockit vulnerability (CVE-2018-2800)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE, JRockit component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: RMI). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 6u181, 7u171 and 8u162; JRockit: R28.3.17. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java SE, JRockit. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Java SE, JRockit accessible data as well as unauthorized read access to a subset of Java SE, JRockit accessible data. Note: This vulnerability can only be exploited by supplying data to APIs in the specified Component without using Untrusted Java Web Start applications or Untrusted Java applets, such as through a web service. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.2 (Confidentiality and Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:N).

vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: CentOS: (CVE-2018-2817) CESA-2018:2439: mariadb

description.html: In OpenSSH 7.9, due to accepting and displaying arbitrary stderr output from the server, a malicious server (or Man-in-The-Middle attacker) can manipulate the client output, for example to use ANSI control codes to hide additional files being transferred.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 OpenSSH 到最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用更新：ftp://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/OpenSSH

OpenSSH的最新版本是7.6。

虽然你可以随时从源代码构建OpenSSH ，许多平台和发行版为OpenSSH提供了预构建的二进制包。这些预建软件包通常是针对特定分配进行定制和优化的，因此我们建议您使用可用于您的操作系统的软件包。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: OpenSSH Vulnerability: CVE-2019-6110

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年10月 Java SE 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10274)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE组件（子组件：Smart Card IO）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u161, 7u151, 8u144 和 9。该漏洞较难利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE。成功的攻击需要攻击者以外的人进行人际交互。对此漏洞的成功攻击可能会导致对关键数据或所有Java SE可访问数据的未经授权的创建，删除或修改访问，以及未授权访问关键数据或完全访问所有Java SE可访问数据。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱Java Applet的客户端中加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如来自Internet的代码）并依赖Java沙箱的安全性。此漏洞不适用于只加载和运行受信任代码（例如管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。CVSS 3.0基本评分6.8（机密性和完整性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:N)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU 2017年10月 Java SE 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10274)

description.html: An issue was discovered in OpenSSH 7.9. Due to missing character encoding in the progress display, a malicious server (or Man-in-The-Middle attacker) can employ crafted object names to manipulate the client output, e.g., by using ANSI control codes to hide additional files being transferred. This affects refresh_progress_meter() in progressmeter.c.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:

OpenSSH的最新版本是7.6。

description.html: Oracle Java SE中的Java SE, Java SE Embedded组件（子组件：Networking）中存在漏洞。受支持的版本是6u141, 7u131和8u121; Java SE Embedded: 8u121。难以利用的漏洞允许未经身份验证的攻击者通过多种协议进行网络访问，从而危及Java SE, Java SE Embedded。成功的攻击需要来自攻击者以外的人的人工交互。成功的攻击可能会导致非法更新，插入或删除一些可访问的Java SE, Java SE Embedded数据的访问权并导致非法读取Java SE, Java SE Embedded可访问数据的子集。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙盒Java小应用程序的客户端中，这些客户端加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如，来自互联网的代码），并依赖Java沙盒来实现安全性。此漏洞不适用于加载并仅运行受信任代码（例如，由管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。CVSS v3.0基础评分4.2（机密性和完整性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:N)。

description.html: GNOME Nautilus before 3.23.90 allows attackers to spoof a file type by using the .desktop file extension, as demonstrated by an attack in which a .desktop file's Name field ends in .pdf but this file's Exec field launches a malicious "sh -c" command. In other words, Nautilus provides no UI indication that a file actually has the potentially unsafe .desktop extension; instead, the UI only shows the .pdf extension. One (slightly) mitigating factor is that an attack requires the .desktop file to have execute permission. The solution is to ask the user to confirm that the file is supposed to be treated as a .desktop file, and then remember the user's answer in the metadata::trusted field.

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU April 2018 Java SE, JRockit vulnerability (CVE-2018-2794)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE, JRockit component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: Security). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 6u181, 7u171, 8u162, 10 and JRockit: R28.3.17. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with logon to the infrastructure where Java SE, JRockit executes to compromise Java SE, JRockit. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker and while the vulnerability is in Java SE, JRockit, attacks may significantly impact additional products. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Java SE, JRockit. Note: Applies to client and server deployment of Java. This vulnerability can be exploited through sandboxed Java Web Start applications and sandboxed Java applets. It can also be exploited by supplying data to APIs in the specified Component without using sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets, such as through a web service. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.7 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H).

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU October 2018 Java SE, Java SE Embedded vulnerability (CVE-2018-3211)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE, Java SE Embedded component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: Serviceability). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 8u182 and 11; Java SE Embedded: 8u181. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with logon to the infrastructure where Java SE, Java SE Embedded executes to compromise Java SE, Java SE Embedded. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized creation, deletion or modification access to critical data or all Java SE, Java SE Embedded accessible data as well as unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Java SE, Java SE Embedded accessible data. Note: This vulnerability applies to Java deployments, typically in clients running sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets (in Java SE 8), that load and run untrusted code (e.g., code that comes from the internet) and rely on the Java sandbox for security. This vulnerability does not apply to Java deployments, typically in servers, that load and run only trusted code (e.g. code installed by an administrator). This vulnerability can only be exploited when Java Usage Tracker functionality is being used. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.6 (Confidentiality and Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:R/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:N).

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

description.html: In OpenSSH 7.9, scp.c in the scp client allows remote SSH servers to bypass intended access restrictions via the filename of . or an empty filename. The impact is modifying the permissions of the target directory on the client side.

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级 OpenSSH 到最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用更新：ftp://ftp.openbsd.org/pub/OpenBSD/OpenSSH

OpenSSH的最新版本是7.6。

虽然你可以随时从源代码构建OpenSSH ，许多平台和发行版为OpenSSH提供了预构建的二进制包。这些预建软件包通常是针对特定分配进行定制和优化的，因此我们建议您使用可用于您的操作系统的软件包。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: OpenSSH Vulnerability: CVE-2018-20685

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2018年1月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit 漏洞 (CVE-2018-2629)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit组件（子组件：JGSS）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u171, 7u161, 8u152 和 9.0.1; Java SE Embedded: 8u151; JRockit: R28.3.16。该漏洞较难利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit。成功的攻击需要攻击者以外的人进行人际交互。此漏洞的成功攻击可导致未经授权创建，删除或修改对关键数据或所有Java SE、Java SE Embedded和JRockit可访问数据的访问权限。注意：此漏洞适用于Java的客户端和服务器部署。此漏洞可以通过沙盒Java Web Start应用程序和沙盒Java小程序来利用。也可以通过向指定组件中的API提供数据而不使用沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱化Java小程序（例如通过Web服务）来利用它。CVSS 3.0基本评分5.3（完整性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:N/I:H/A:N)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU 2018年1月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit 漏洞 (CVE-2018-2629)

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2018年1月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded 漏洞 (CVE-2018-2641)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded组件（子组件：AWT）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u171, 7u161, 8u152 和 9.0.1; Java SE Embedded: 8u151。该漏洞较难利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded。成功的攻击需要攻击者以外的人员进行人员交互，虽然此漏洞存在于Java SE和Java SE Embedded中，但攻击可能会对其他产品产生重大影响。对此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致未经授权创建，删除或修改对关键数据或所有Java SE和Java SE Embedded可访问数据的访问权限。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱Java Applet的客户端中加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如来自Internet的代码）并依赖Java沙箱的安全性。此漏洞不适用于只加载和运行受信任代码（例如管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。CVSS 3.0基本评分6.1（完整性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:C/C:N/I:H/A:N)。

This vulnerability does not apply to Java deployments, typically in servers, that load and run only trusted code (e.g., code installed by an administrator). CVSS 3.0 Base Score 3.1 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L).

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年7月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10193)

description.html: Oracle Java SE的Java SE、Java SE Embedded组件（子组件：Security）中的漏洞。受影响的支持版本有 Java SE: 6u151, 7u141 和 8u131; Java SE Embedded: 8u131。该漏洞较难利用，允许未经身份验证的能访问网络的攻击者通过多种协议来危害Java SE、Java SE Embedded。成功的攻击需要攻击者以外的人进行人际交互。此漏洞的成功攻击可能会导致对Java SE和Java SE Embedded可访问数据的子集进行未经授权的读取访问。注意：此漏洞适用于Java部署，通常在运行沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙箱Java Applet的客户端中加载和运行不受信任的代码（例如来自Internet的代码）并依赖Java沙箱的安全性。此漏洞不适用于只加载和运行受信任代码（例如管理员安装的代码）的Java部署（通常在服务器中）。CVSS 3.0基本评分3.1（机密性影响）。CVSS向量: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N)。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU 2017年7月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded 漏洞 (CVE-2017-10193)

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU April 2018 Java SE, Java SE Embedded vulnerability (CVE-2018-2790)

description.html: Vulnerability in the Java SE, Java SE Embedded component of Oracle Java SE (subcomponent: Security). Supported versions that are affected are Java SE: 6u181, 7u171, 8u162 and 10; Java SE Embedded: 8u161. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise Java SE, Java SE Embedded. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Java SE, Java SE Embedded accessible data. Note: This vulnerability applies to Java deployments, typically in clients running sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets, that load and run untrusted code (e.g., code that comes from the internet) and rely on the Java sandbox for security. This vulnerability does not apply to Java deployments, typically in servers, that load and run only trusted code (e.g., code installed by an administrator). CVSS 3.0 Base Score 3.1 (Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N).

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: Java CPU April 2018 Java SE, Java SE Embedded vulnerability (CVE-2018-2790)

description.html: A memory leak was discovered in the backport of fixes for CVE-2018-16864 in Red Hat Enterprise Linux. Function dispatch_message_real() in journald-server.c does not free the memory allocated by set_iovec_field_free() to store the `_CMDLINE=` entry. A local attacker may use this flaw to make systemd-journald crash. This issue only affects versions shipped with Red Hat Enterprise since v219-62.2.

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: Java CPU 2017年1月 Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit JAAS 漏洞 (CVE-2017-3252)

description.html: Oracle Java SE (子组件:JAAS)中的Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit组件中存在漏洞。受支持的版本为Java SE: 6u131, 7u121 and 8u112; Java SE Embedded: 8u111; JRockit: R28.3.12。难以利用的漏洞允许网络权限低的未经身份验证的攻击者通过多种协议危及Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit。成功的攻击需要来自攻击者以外的人的人工交互，而且该漏洞在Java SE, Java SE Embedded, JRockit中，攻击可能会严重影响其他产品。此漏洞的成功攻击可能导致未经授权创建、删除或修改关键数据或所有Java SE，Java SE Embedded，JRockit可访问数据的访问权。注意：适用于客户端和服务器部署Java。可以通过沙盒Java Web Start应用程序和沙盒Java小程序来利用此漏洞。也可以通过向指定的组件中的API提供数据，而不使用沙盒Java Web Start应用程序或沙盒Java小程序（例如通过Web服务）来利用它。CVSS v3.0基本分数5.8（完整性影响）。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
升级到Oracle Java的最新版本

从以下地址下载并应用此更新: https://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

当您一直使用构建来自源的OpenSSH时, 多个平台和版本为Apache HTTP服务器提供预先编译的二进制包。对于特殊版本通常自定义和优化预先编译的包。因此，如果它们适用于操作系统，我们推荐您使用这些包。

assetsScanVulnerabilities.title: 没有真正的所有者或组的文件和目录

description.html: 在系统上发现没有真正的所有者或组的一个或多个文件或目录。文件和目录有与之关联的所有者ID和组ID。文件的所有者ID或组ID可能不对应于真实的用户（/etc/passwd内）或实际组（/etc/group内）。当删除用户或组拥有的文件时会发生这种情况。它也发生在从某些选项中获取.tar文件时。不存在的用户或组ID所拥有的文件或目录存在风险，该用户或组ID可以被分配到新创建的用户或用户组，成员可自动访问该文件。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
删除文件或分配给所有人

对于系统中的任意的un-owned文件或者目录，要么删除要么使用"chown"分配一个用户或者组。可使用以下命令来查看un-owned的文件或者目录：

find / -nouser -o -nogroup
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: 没有真正的所有者或组的文件和目录

description.html: 在未启用某些硬化选项的情况下安装一个或多个系统的分区。当这不是一个明确的漏洞时，要通过采用硬化技术来改善系统的安全性。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
分区安装漏洞

修改分区安装方式的具体方法因系统而异。请咨询您的操作系统使用手册或安装手册页。
vulnerabilitiesDetail.title: 分区安装漏洞

description.html: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent: Server: Replication). Supported versions that are affected are 5.5.57 and earlier, 5.6.37 and earlier and 5.7.19 and earlier. Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with logon to the infrastructure where MySQL Server executes to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all MySQL Server accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 4.1 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:H/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).

description.html:
远程主机响应ICMP时间戳的一个请求。在ICMP时间戳回应包含远程主机的日期和时间。此信息理论上可能用来对付一些系统，去利用在其他设备中的微弱的期限随机数发生器。

此外，某些操作系统的版本可以通过分析他们对无效的ICMP时间戳请求的反应，精确地采取指纹。

vulnerabilitiesDetail.solution:
禁用Cisco PIX的ICMP时间戳响应

正确配置的PIX防火墙可以不响应ICMP数据包的外部接口。在PIX软件版本4.1（6）直到5.2.1，ICMP可以访问PIX的内部接口，PIX不能配置为不响应。在PIX软件版本5.2.1开始，内部接口仍然默认是ICMP，但其内部接口的ICMP响应可以用ICMP命令禁用，如下，在<inside>是内部接口的名称:

   icmp deny any 13 <inside>
   icmp deny any 14 <inside>

完成配置后不要忘记保存

更多信息查看Cisco的支持文档Handling ICMP Pings with the PIX Firewall

最简单和最有效的解决方案是配置你的 防火墙阻止传入和传出的ICMP报文和ICMP 类型13（时间戳请求）和14（时间戳响应）。

禁用Windows XP/2K3的ICMP时间戳响应

在ICMP配置面板中选择Windows防火墙通过取消勾选"允许传入的时间戳请求"可以可以禁用ICMP时间戳的响应。 更多信息请看http://support.microsoft.com/kb/313190

最简单和最有效的解决办法是配置你的防火墙阻止传入和传出的ICMP类型13（ICMP时间戳请求）和14（时间戳响应）。

在ICMP配置面板中选择Windows防火墙通过取消勾选"允许传入的时间戳请求"可以可以禁用ICMP时间戳的响应。

  1. 进入网络连接控制面板。
  2. Right click on the network adapter and select "properties", or select the internet adapter and select File->Properties. 右键单击"网络适配器"，选择"属性"，或选择"网络适配器"和选择"文件"->"属性"。
  3. 选择 "高级" tab.
  4. 在防火墙的窗口, 选择"设置".
  5. 选择"常规" tab.
  6. 选择"on (recommended)"选项，开启防火墙.
  7. 选择 "高级" tab.
  8. 在防火墙的窗口, 选择"设置".
  9. 取消 "允许传入的时间戳请求" 选项.
  10. 选择"OK"退出ICMP 设置窗口，保存退出.
  11. 选择"OK" 退出Windows防火墙窗口保存设置.
  12. 选择"OK" 退出网络是配置窗口.

更多信息请看:http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true

禁用SGI Irix的ICMP时间戳响应

IRIX不提供禁用ICMP时间戳响应的途径。因此，应采用ipfilterd和/或通过防火墙阻断受影响主机的ICMP。

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。

禁用Windows NT 4的ICMP时间戳响应

Windows NT 4不提供阻止ICMP数据包的途径。因此，应通过防火墙阻止它们。

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。

禁用Solaris的TCMP时间戳响应

执行以下命令：

   /usr/sbin/ndd -set /dev/ip ip_respond_to_timestamp 0
   /usr/sbin/ndd -set /dev/ip ip_respond_to_timestamp_broadcast 0

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。

禁用Linux的ICMP时间戳响应

Linux既不提供sysctl也不提供/proc/sys/net/ipv4接口使ICMP时间戳响应禁用。因此，应采用iptables和/或通过防火墙阻止受影响的主机的ICMP。例如：

   ipchains -A input -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-request -j DROP
   ipchains -A output -p icmp --icmp-type timestamp-reply -j DROP

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。

禁用Windows 2000的ICMP时间戳响应

使用IPSec过滤器功能定义和实现一个IP筛选列表阻止ICMP13、14类型。注意，在"网络和拨号连接"控制面板的标准TCP/IP的阻止能力不能阻止ICMP（只能阻止TCP 和UDP）。IPSec过滤器的功能与IPSec严格标准相关，允许选择性地阻断这些ICMP包。 更多信息请查阅http://support.microsoft.com/kb/313190

最简单和最有效的解决办法是配置你的防火墙阻止传入和传出的ICMP类型13（子网掩码请求）和14（子网掩码响应）的ICMP 包。

禁用HP/UX的ICMP时间戳响应

执行以下命令：

ndd -set /dev/ip ip_respond_to_timestamp_broadcast 0

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。

禁用Cisco IOS的ICMP时间戳响应

用ACL阻止13型和14型ICMP。例如：

   deny icmp any any 13
   deny icmp any any 14

注意，一般情况下最好采用能通过默认值阻止全部的ACL，然后选择性地允许特定类型的通信。例如，阻止全部，然后仅允许ICMP不可达、ICMP回波应答、ICMP超时和ICMP源抑制：

   permit icmp any any unreachable
   permit icmp any any echo-reply
   permit icmp any any time-exceeded
   permit icmp any any source-quench

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。

禁用OpenBSD的TCMP时间戳响应

设置"net.inet.icmp.tstamprepl" sysctl变量为0。

   sysctl -w net.inet.icmp.tstamprepl=0

最简单有效的解决方案是对防火墙进行配置，阻止输入和输出13型（时间戳请求）和14型ICMP数据包（时间戳响应）。

禁用ICMP时间戳响应

禁用对设备的ICMP时间戳响应。如果设备不支持这种级别的配置，最新且最有效的解决办法是配置防火墙通过13型（时间戳请求）和14型（时间戳响应）阻止输入和输出ICMP。

禁用Windows Vista/2008的ICMP时间戳响应

ICMP时间戳响应可通过netsh命令行公用程序禁用。

  1. 进入Windows控制面板。
  2. 选择"Windows Firewall".
  3. 在Windows Firewall选项框中，选择"更改设置"。
  4. 通过选择"(推荐)" 选项启用防火墙。
  5. 打开命令提示符。
  6. 输入"防火墙设置icmpsetting 13 禁用"

更多信息请参照：http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/windows/xp/all/proddocs/en-us/hnw_understanding_firewall.mspx?mfr=true
